verses.translation: or add to it [at will]; and [during that time] recite the Qur’an calmly and distinctly, with thy mind attuned to its meaning.

verses.content: إِنَّا سَنُلْقِي عَلَيْكَ قَوْلًا ثَقِيلًا
verses.translation: Behold, We shall bestow upon thee a weighty message –

verses.content: إِنَّ نَاشِئَةَ اللَّيْلِ هِيَ أَشَدُّ وَطْئًا وَأَقْوَمُ قِيلًا
verses.translation: [and,] verily, the hours of night the mind most strongly and speak with the clearest voice,

verses.content: إِنَّ لَكَ فِي النَّهَارِ سَبْحًا طَوِيلًا
verses.translation: whereas by day a long chain of doings is thy portion.

verses.content: وَاذْكُرِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلْ إِلَيْهِ تَبْتِيلًا
verses.translation: But [whether by night or by day,] remember thy Sustainer's name, and devote thyself unto Him with utter devotion.

verses.content: رَّبُّ الْمَشْرِقِ وَالْمَغْرِبِ لَا إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَاتَّخِذْهُ وَكِيلًا
verses.translation: The Sustainer of the east and the west [is He]: there is no deity save Him: hence, ascribe to Him alone the power to determine thy fate,

verses.content: وَاصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَاهْجُرْهُمْ هَجْرًا جَمِيلًا
verses.translation: and endure with patience whatever people may say [against thee], and avoid them with a comely avoidance.

verses.content: وَذَرْنِي وَالْمُكَذِّبِينَ أُولِي النَّعْمَةِ وَمَهِّلْهُمْ قَلِيلًا
verses.translation: And leave Me alone [to deal] with those who give the lie to the truth - those who enjoy the blessings of life [without any thought of God] - and bear thou with them for a little while:

verses.content: إِنَّ لَدَيْنَا أَنكَالًا وَجَحِيمًا
verses.translation: for, behold, heavy fetters [await them] with Us, and a blazing fire,

verses.content: وَطَعَامًا ذَا غُصَّةٍ وَعَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
verses.translation: and food that chokes, and grievous suffering

verses.content: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ الْأَرْضُ وَالْجِبَالُ وَكَانَتِ الْجِبَالُ كَثِيبًا مَّهِيلًا
verses.translation: on the Day when the earth and the mountains will be convulsed and the mountains will [crumble and] become like a sand-dune on the move!

verses.content: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا إِلَيْكُمْ رَسُولًا شَاهِدًا عَلَيْكُمْ كَمَا أَرْسَلْنَا إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ رَسُولًا
verses.translation: BEHOLD, [O men,] We have sent unto you an apostle who shall bear witness to the truth before you, even as We sent an apostle unto Pharaoh:

verses.content: فَعَصَىٰ فِرْعَوْنُ الرَّسُولَ فَأَخَذْنَاهُ أَخْذًا وَبِيلًا
verses.translation: and Pharaoh rebelled against the apostle, whereupon We took him to task with a crushing grip.

verses.content: فَكَيْفَ تَتَّقُونَ إِن كَفَرْتُمْ يَوْمًا يَجْعَلُ الْوِلْدَانَ شِيبًا
verses.translation: How, then, if you refuse to acknowledge the truth, will you protect yourselves on that Day which shall turn the hair of children grey,

verses.content: السَّمَاءُ مُنفَطِرٌ بِهِ ۚ كَانَ وَعْدُهُ مَفْعُولًا
verses.translation: [the Day] on which the skies shall be rent asunder, [and] His promise [of resurrection] fulfilled?

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِ تَذْكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَن شَاءَ اتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِ سَبِيلًا
verses.translation: This, verily, is a reminder: let him who wills, then set out on a way to his Sustainer!

verses.content: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَعْلَمُ أَنَّكَ تَقُومُ أَدْنَىٰ مِن ثُلُثَيِ اللَّيْلِ وَنِصْفَهُ وَثُلُثَهُ وَطَائِفَةٌ مِّنَ الَّذِينَ مَعَكَ ۚ وَاللَّهُ يُقَدِّرُ اللَّيْلَ وَالنَّهَارَ ۚ عَلِمَ أَن لَّن تُحْصُوهُ فَتَابَ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ فَاقْرَءُوا مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنَ الْقُرْآنِ ۚ عَلِمَ أَن سَيَكُونُ مِنكُم مَّرْضَىٰ ۙ وَآخَرُونَ يَضْرِبُونَ فِي الْأَرْضِ يَبْتَغُونَ مِن فَضْلِ اللَّهِ ۙ وَآخَرُونَ يُقَاتِلُونَ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ ۖ فَاقْرَءُوا مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنْهُ ۚ وَأَقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَآتُوا الزَّكَاةَ وَأَقْرِضُوا اللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا ۚ وَمَا تُقَدِّمُوا لِأَنفُسِكُم مِّنْ خَيْرٍ تَجِدُوهُ عِندَ اللَّهِ هُوَ خَيْرًا وَأَعْظَمَ أَجْرًا ۚ وَاسْتَغْفِرُوا اللَّهَ ۖ إِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.translation: BEHOLD, [O Prophet,] thy Sustainer knows that thou keepest awake [in prayer] nearly two-thirds of the night, or one-half of it, or a third of it, together with some of those who follow thee. And God who determines the measure of night and day, is aware that you would never grudge it: and therefore He turns towards you in His grace. Recite, then, as much of the Qur’an as you may do with ease. He knows that in time there will be among you sick people, and others who will go about the land in search of God's bounty, and others who will fight in God’s cause. Recite, then, [only] as much of it as you may do with ease, and be constant in prayer, and spend in charity, and [thus] lend unto God a goodly loan: for whatever good deed you may offer up in your own behalf, you shall truly find it with God - yea, better, and richer in reward. And [always] seek God's forgiveness: behold, God is much-forgiving, a dispenser of grace!

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ يَا أَيُّهَا الْمُدَّثِّرُ
verses.translation: O THOU [in thy solitude] enfolded!

verses.content: قُمْ فَأَنذِرْ
verses.translation: Arise and warn!

verses.content: وَرَبَّكَ فَكَبِّرْ
verses.translation: And thy Sustainer's greatness glorify!

verses.content: وَثِيَابَكَ فَطَهِّرْ
verses.translation: And thine inner self purify!

verses.content: وَالرُّجْزَ فَاهْجُرْ
verses.translation: And all defilement shun!

verses.content: وَلَا تَمْنُن تَسْتَكْثِرُ
verses.translation: And do not through giving seek thyself to gain,

verses.content: وَلِرَبِّكَ فَاصْبِرْ
verses.translation: but unto thy Sustainer turn in patience.

verses.content: فَإِذَا نُقِرَ فِي النَّاقُورِ
verses.translation: And [warn all men that] when the trumpet-call [of resurrection] is sounded,

verses.content: فَذَٰلِكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ يَوْمٌ عَسِيرٌ
verses.translation: that very Day shall be a day of anguish,

verses.content: عَلَى الْكَافِرِينَ غَيْرُ يَسِيرٍ
verses.translation: not of ease, for all who [now] deny the truth!

verses.content: ذَرْنِي وَمَنْ خَلَقْتُ وَحِيدًا
verses.translation: LEAVE Me alone [to deal] with him whom I have created alone,

verses.content: وَجَعَلْتُ لَهُ مَالًا مَّمْدُودًا
verses.translation: and to whom I have granted resources vast,

verses.content: وَبَنِينَ شُهُودًا
verses.translation: and children as [love's] witnesses,

verses.content: وَمَهَّدتُّ لَهُ تَمْهِيدًا
verses.translation: and to whose life I gave so wide a scope:

verses.content: ثُمَّ يَطْمَعُ أَنْ أَزِيدَ
verses.translation: and yet, he greedily desires that I give yet more!

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ إِنَّهُ كَانَ لِآيَاتِنَا عَنِيدًا
verses.translation: Nay, verily, it is against Our messages that he knowingly, stubbornly sets himself

verses.content: سَأُرْهِقُهُ صَعُودًا
verses.translation: [and so] I shall constrain him to endure a painful uphill climb!

verses.content: إِنَّهُ فَكَّرَ وَقَدَّرَ
verses.translation: Behold, [when Our messages are conveyed to one who is bent on denying the truth,] he reflects and meditates [as to how to disprove them] –

verses.content: فَقُتِلَ كَيْفَ قَدَّرَ
verses.translation: and thus he destroys himself, the way he meditates:

verses.content: ثُمَّ قُتِلَ كَيْفَ قَدَّرَ
verses.translation: yea, he destroys himself, the way he meditates!

verses.content: ثُمَّ نَظَرَ
verses.translation: and then he looks [around for new arguments],

verses.content: ثُمَّ عَبَسَ وَبَسَرَ
verses.translation: and then he frowns and glares,

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ وَاسْتَكْبَرَ
verses.translation: and in the end he turns his back [on Our message], and glories in his arrogance,

verses.content: فَقَالَ إِنْ هَـٰذَا إِلَّا سِحْرٌ يُؤْثَرُ
verses.translation: and says, "All this is mere spellbinding eloquence handed down [from olden times]!

verses.content: إِنْ هَـٰذَا إِلَّا قَوْلُ الْبَشَرِ
verses.translation: This is nothing but the word of mortal man!"

verses.content: سَأُصْلِيهِ سَقَرَ
verses.translation: [Hence,] I shall cause him to endure hell-fire [in the life to come]!

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا سَقَرُ
verses.translation: And what could make thee conceive what hell-fire is?

verses.content: لَا تُبْقِي وَلَا تَذَرُ
verses.translation: It does not allow to live, and neither leaves [to die],

verses.content: لَوَّاحَةٌ لِّلْبَشَرِ
verses.translation: making [all truth] visible to mortal man.

verses.content: عَلَيْهَا تِسْعَةَ عَشَرَ
verses.translation: Over it are nineteen [powers].

verses.content: وَمَا جَعَلْنَا أَصْحَابَ النَّارِ إِلَّا مَلَائِكَةً ۙ وَمَا جَعَلْنَا عِدَّتَهُمْ إِلَّا فِتْنَةً لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لِيَسْتَيْقِنَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ وَيَزْدَادَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِيمَانًا ۙ وَلَا يَرْتَابَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ وَالْمُؤْمِنُونَ ۙ وَلِيَقُولَ الَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ وَالْكَافِرُونَ مَاذَا أَرَادَ اللَّهُ بِهَـٰذَا مَثَلًا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُضِلُّ اللَّهُ مَن يَشَاءُ وَيَهْدِي مَن يَشَاءُ ۚ وَمَا يَعْلَمُ جُنُودَ رَبِّكَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ وَمَا هِيَ إِلَّا ذِكْرَىٰ لِلْبَشَرِ
verses.translation: For We have caused none but angelic powers to lord over the fire [of hell]; and We have not caused their number to be aught but a trial for those who are bent on denying the truth - to the end that they who have been granted revelation aforetime might be convinced [of the truth of this divine writ]; and that they who have attained to faith [in it] might grow yet more firm in their faith; and that [both] they who have been granted the earlier revelation and they who believe [in this one] might be freed of all doubt; and that they in whose hearts is disease and the who deny the truth outright might ask, "What does [your] God mean by this parable?" In this way God lets go astray him that wills [to go astray], and guides aright him that wills [to be guided]. And none can comprehend thy Sustainers forces save Him alone: and all this is but a reminder to mortal man.

verses.content: كَلَّا وَالْقَمَرِ
verses.translation: NAY, but consider the moon!

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذْ أَدْبَرَ
verses.translation: Consider the night when it departs,

verses.content: وَالصُّبْحِ إِذَا أَسْفَرَ
verses.translation: and the morn when it dawns!

verses.content: إِنَّهَا لَإِحْدَى الْكُبَرِ
verses.translation: Verily, that [hell-fire) is Indeed one of the great [forewarnings] –

verses.content: نَذِيرًا لِّلْبَشَرِ
verses.translation: a warning to mortal man –

verses.content: لِمَن شَاءَ مِنكُمْ أَن يَتَقَدَّمَ أَوْ يَتَأَخَّرَ
verses.translation: to everyone of you, whether he chooses to come forward or to hang back!

verses.content: كُلُّ نَفْسٍ بِمَا كَسَبَتْ رَهِينَةٌ
verses.translation: [On the Day of Judgment,] every human being will be held in pledge for whatever [evil] he has wrought –

verses.content: إِلَّا أَصْحَابَ الْيَمِينِ
verses.translation: save those who shall have attained to righteousness:

verses.content: فِي جَنَّاتٍ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ
verses.translation: [dwelling] In gardens [of paradise], they will inquire

verses.content: عَنِ الْمُجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: of those who were lost in sin:

verses.content: مَا سَلَكَكُمْ فِي سَقَرَ
verses.translation: "What has brought you into hell-fire?"

verses.content: قَالُوا لَمْ نَكُ مِنَ الْمُصَلِّينَ
verses.translation: They will answer: "We were not among those who prayed;

verses.content: وَلَمْ نَكُ نُطْعِمُ الْمِسْكِينَ
verses.translation: and neither did we feed the needy;

verses.content: وَكُنَّا نَخُوضُ مَعَ الْخَائِضِينَ
verses.translation: and we were wont to indulge in sinning together with all [the others] who indulged in it;

verses.content: وَكُنَّا نُكَذِّبُ بِيَوْمِ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: and the Day of Judgment we were wont to call a lie –

verses.content: حَتَّىٰ أَتَانَا الْيَقِينُ
verses.translation: until certainty came upon us [in death]."

verses.content: فَمَا تَنفَعُهُمْ شَفَاعَةُ الشَّافِعِينَ
verses.translation: And so, of no benefit to them could be the intercession of any that would intercede for them.

verses.content: فَمَا لَهُمْ عَنِ التَّذْكِرَةِ مُعْرِضِينَ
verses.translation: WHAT, THEN, is amiss with them that they turn away from all admonition

verses.content: كَأَنَّهُمْ حُمُرٌ مُّسْتَنفِرَةٌ
verses.translation: as though they were terrified asses

verses.content: فَرَّتْ مِن قَسْوَرَةٍ
verses.translation: fleeing from a lion?

verses.content: بَلْ يُرِيدُ كُلُّ امْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُؤْتَىٰ صُحُفًا مُّنَشَّرَةً
verses.translation: Yea, everyone of them claims that he [himself] ought to have been given revelations unfolded!

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ بَل لَّا يَخَافُونَ الْآخِرَةَ
verses.translation: Nay, but they do not [believe in and, hence, do not] fear the life to come.

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّهُ تَذْكِرَةٌ
verses.translation: Nay, verily, this is an admonition –

verses.content: فَمَن شَاءَ ذَكَرَهُ
verses.translation: and whoever wills may take it to heart.

verses.content: وَمَا يَذْكُرُونَ إِلَّا أَن يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ هُوَ أَهْلُ التَّقْوَىٰ وَأَهْلُ الْمَغْفِرَةِ
verses.translation: But they [who do not believe in the life to come] will not take it to heart unless God so wills: [for] He is the Fount of all God-consciousness, and the Fount of all forgiveness.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ لَا أُقْسِمُ بِيَوْمِ الْقِيَامَةِ
verses.translation: NAY! I call to witness the Day of Resurrection!

verses.content: وَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِالنَّفْسِ اللَّوَّامَةِ
verses.translation: But nay! I call to witness the accusing voice of man's own conscience!

verses.content: أَيَحْسَبُ الْإِنسَانُ أَلَّن نَّجْمَعَ عِظَامَهُ
verses.translation: Does man think that We cannot [resurrect him and] bring his bones together again?

verses.content: بَلَىٰ قَادِرِينَ عَلَىٰ أَن نُّسَوِّيَ بَنَانَهُ
verses.translation: Yea indeed, We are able to make whole his very finger-tips!

verses.content: بَلْ يُرِيدُ الْإِنسَانُ لِيَفْجُرَ أَمَامَهُ
verses.translation: None the less man chooses to deny what lies ahead of him,

verses.content: يَسْأَلُ أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ الْقِيَامَةِ
verses.translation: asking [derisively], "When is that Resurrection Day to be?"

verses.content: فَإِذَا بَرِقَ الْبَصَرُ
verses.translation: But [on that Day,] when the eyesight is by fear confounded,

verses.content: وَخَسَفَ الْقَمَرُ
verses.translation: and the moon is darkened,

verses.content: وَجُمِعَ الشَّمْسُ وَالْقَمَرُ
verses.translation: and the sun and the moon are brought together

verses.content: يَقُولُ الْإِنسَانُ يَوْمَئِذٍ أَيْنَ الْمَفَرُّ
verses.translation: on that Day will man exclaim "Whither to flee?"

verses.content: كَلَّا لَا وَزَرَ
verses.translation: But nay: no refuge [for thee, O man]!

verses.content: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ الْمُسْتَقَرُّ
verses.translation: With thy Sustainer, on that Day, the journey's end will be!

verses.content: يُنَبَّأُ الْإِنسَانُ يَوْمَئِذٍ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ
verses.translation: Man will be apprised, on that Day, of what he has done and what he has left undone:

verses.content: بَلِ الْإِنسَانُ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِهِ بَصِيرَةٌ
verses.translation: nay, but man shall against himself be an eye-witness,

verses.content: وَلَوْ أَلْقَىٰ مَعَاذِيرَهُ
verses.translation: even though he may veil himself in excuses.

verses.content: لَا تُحَرِّكْ بِهِ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعْجَلَ بِهِ
verses.translation: MOVE NOT thy tongue in haste, [repeating the words of the revelation:]

verses.content: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا جَمْعَهُ وَقُرْآنَهُ
verses.translation: for, behold, it is for Us to gather it [in thy heart,] and to cause it to be read [as it ought to be read].

verses.content: فَإِذَا قَرَأْنَاهُ فَاتَّبِعْ قُرْآنَهُ
verses.translation: Thus, when We recite it, follow thou its wording [with all thy mind]:

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا بَيَانَهُ
verses.translation: and then, behold, it will be for Us to make its meaning clear.

verses.content: كَلَّا بَلْ تُحِبُّونَ الْعَاجِلَةَ
verses.translation: NAY, but [most of] you love this fleeting life,

verses.content: وَتَذَرُونَ الْآخِرَةَ
verses.translation: and give no thought to the life to come [and to Judgment Day]!

verses.content: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ نَّاضِرَةٌ
verses.translation: Some faces will on that Day be bright with happiness,

verses.content: إِلَىٰ رَبِّهَا نَاظِرَةٌ
verses.translation: looking up to their Sustainer;

verses.content: وَوُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ بَاسِرَةٌ
verses.translation: and some faces will on that Day be overcast with despair,

verses.content: تَظُنُّ أَن يُفْعَلَ بِهَا فَاقِرَةٌ
verses.translation: knowing that a crushing calamity is about to befall them.

verses.content: كَلَّا إِذَا بَلَغَتِ التَّرَاقِيَ
verses.translation: NAY, but when [the last breath] comes up to the throat [of a dying man],

verses.content: وَقِيلَ مَنْ ۜ رَاقٍ
verses.translation: and people ask, "Is there any wizard [that could save him]?"

verses.content: وَظَنَّ أَنَّهُ الْفِرَاقُ
verses.translation: the while he [himself] knows that this is the parting,

verses.content: وَالْتَفَّتِ السَّاقُ بِالسَّاقِ
verses.translation: and is enwrapped in the pangs of death

verses.content: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ الْمَسَاقُ
verses.translation: at that time towards thy Sustainer does he feel impelled to turn!

verses.content: فَلَا صَدَّقَ وَلَا صَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: [Useless, though, will be his repentance: for [as long as he was alive] he did not accept the truth, nor did he pray [for enlightenment],

verses.content: وَلَـٰكِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: but, on the contrary, he gave the lie to the truth and turned away [from it],

verses.content: ثُمَّ ذَهَبَ إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِ يَتَمَطَّىٰ
verses.translation: and then went arrogantly back to what he had come from.

verses.content: أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰ
verses.translation: [And yet, O man, thine end comes hourly] nearer unto thee, and nearer –

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰ
verses.translation: and ever nearer unto thee, and nearer!

verses.content: أَيَحْسَبُ الْإِنسَانُ أَن يُتْرَكَ سُدًى
verses.translation: DOES MAN, then, think that he is to be left to himself to go about at will?

verses.content: أَلَمْ يَكُ نُطْفَةً مِّن مَّنِيٍّ يُمْنَىٰ
verses.translation: Was he not once a [mere] drop of sperm that had been spilt,

verses.content: ثُمَّ كَانَ عَلَقَةً فَخَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
verses.translation: and thereafter became a germ-cell - whereupon He created and formed [it] in accordance with what [it] was meant to be,

verses.content: فَجَعَلَ مِنْهُ الزَّوْجَيْنِ الذَّكَرَ وَالْأُنثَىٰ
verses.translation: and fashioned out of it the two sexes, the male and the female?

verses.content: أَلَيْسَ ذَٰلِكَ بِقَادِرٍ عَلَىٰ أَن يُحْيِيَ الْمَوْتَىٰ
verses.translation: Is not He, then; able to bring the dead back to life?

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ هَلْ أَتَىٰ عَلَى الْإِنسَانِ حِينٌ مِّنَ الدَّهْرِ لَمْ يَكُن شَيْئًا مَّذْكُورًا
verses.translation: HAS THERE [not] been an endless span of time before man [appeared - a time] when he was not yet a thing to be thought of?

verses.content: إِنَّا خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ أَمْشَاجٍ نَّبْتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلْنَاهُ سَمِيعًا بَصِيرًا
verses.translation: Verily, it is We who have created man out of a drop of sperm intermingled, so that We might try him [in his later life]: and therefore We made him a being endowed with hearing and sight.

verses.content: إِنَّا هَدَيْنَاهُ السَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرًا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا
verses.translation: Verily, We have shown him the way: [and it rests with him to prove himself] either grateful or ungrateful.

verses.content: إِنَّا أَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَافِرِينَ سَلَاسِلَ وَأَغْلَالًا وَسَعِيرًا
verses.translation: [Now,] behold, for those who deny the truth We have readied chains and shackles, and a blazing flame

verses.content: إِنَّ الْأَبْرَارَ يَشْرَبُونَ مِن كَأْسٍ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا
verses.translation: [whereas,] behold, the truly virtuous shall drink from a cup flavoured with the calyx of sweet-smelling flowers:

verses.content: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ اللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفْجِيرًا
verses.translation: a source [of bliss] whereof God's servants shall drink, seeing it flow in a flow abundant.

verses.content: يُوفُونَ بِالنَّذْرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوْمًا كَانَ شَرُّهُ مُسْتَطِيرًا
verses.translation: [The truly virtuous are] they [who] fulfil their vows, and stand in awe of a Day the woe of which is bound to spread far and wide,

verses.content: وَيُطْعِمُونَ الطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِ مِسْكِينًا وَيَتِيمًا وَأَسِيرًا
verses.translation: and who give food - however great be their own want of it - unto the needy, and the orphan, and the captive,

verses.content: إِنَّمَا نُطْعِمُكُمْ لِوَجْهِ اللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمْ جَزَاءً وَلَا شُكُورًا
verses.translation: [saying, in their hearts,] "We feed you for the sake of God alone: we desire no recompense from you, nor thanks:

verses.content: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوْمًا عَبُوسًا قَمْطَرِيرًا
verses.translation: behold, we stand in awe of our Sustainer's judgment on a distressful, fateful Day!"

verses.content: فَوَقَاهُمُ اللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ الْيَوْمِ وَلَقَّاهُمْ نَضْرَةً وَسُرُورًا
verses.translation: And so, God will preserve them from the woes of that Day, and will bestow on them brightness and joy,

verses.content: وَجَزَاهُم بِمَا صَبَرُوا جَنَّةً وَحَرِيرًا
verses.translation: and will reward them for all their patience in adversity with a garden [of bliss] and with [garments of] silk.

verses.content: مُّتَّكِئِينَ فِيهَا عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ ۖ لَا يَرَوْنَ فِيهَا شَمْسًا وَلَا زَمْهَرِيرًا
verses.translation: In that [garden] they will on couches recline, and will know therein neither [burning] sun nor cold severe,

verses.content: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيْهِمْ ظِلَالُهَا وَذُلِّلَتْ قُطُوفُهَا تَذْلِيلًا
verses.translation: since its [blissful] shades will come down low over them, and low will hang down its clusters of fruit, most easy to reach.

verses.content: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِآنِيَةٍ مِّن فِضَّةٍ وَأَكْوَابٍ كَانَتْ قَوَارِيرَا
verses.translation: And they will be waited upon with vessels of silver and goblets that will [seem to] be crystal –

verses.content: قَوَارِيرَ مِن فِضَّةٍ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقْدِيرًا
verses.translation: crystal-like, [but] of silver - the measure whereof they alone will determine.

verses.content: وَيُسْقَوْنَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا
verses.translation: And in that [paradise] they will be given to drink of a cup flavoured with ginger,

verses.content: عَيْنًا فِيهَا تُسَمَّىٰ سَلْسَبِيلًا
verses.translation: [derived from] a source [to be found] therein, whose name is "Seek Thy Way".

verses.content: وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْدَانٌ مُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيْتَهُمْ حَسِبْتَهُمْ لُؤْلُؤًا مَّنثُورًا
verses.translation: And immortal youths will wait upon them: when thou seest them, thou wouldst deem them to be scattered pearls;

verses.content: وَإِذَا رَأَيْتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيْتَ نَعِيمًا وَمُلْكًا كَبِيرًا
verses.translation: and when thou seest [anything that is] there thou wilt see [only] bliss and a realm transcendent

verses.content: عَالِيَهُمْ ثِيَابُ سُندُسٍ خُضْرٌ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٌ ۖ وَحُلُّوا أَسَاوِرَ مِن فِضَّةٍ وَسَقَاهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ شَرَابًا طَهُورًا
verses.translation: Upon those [blest] will be garments of green silk and brocade; and they will be adorned with bracelets of silver. And their Sustainer will them to drink of a drink most pure.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمْ جَزَاءً وَكَانَ سَعْيُكُم مَّشْكُورًا
verses.translation: [And they will be told:] "Verily, all this is your reward since Your endeavour [in life] has met [God's] goodly acceptance!"

verses.content: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ الْقُرْآنَ تَنزِيلًا
verses.translation: VERILY, [O believer,] it is We who have bestowed from on high this Qur’an upon thee, step by step - truly a bestowal from on high!

verses.content: فَاصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعْ مِنْهُمْ آثِمًا أَوْ كَفُورًا
verses.translation: Await, then, in all patience thy Sustainer's judgment, and pay no heed to any of them, who is a wilful sinner or an ingrate;

verses.content: وَاذْكُرِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا
verses.translation: and bear in mind thy Sustainer's name at morn and evening

verses.content: وَمِنَ اللَّيْلِ فَاسْجُدْ لَهُ وَسَبِّحْهُ لَيْلًا طَوِيلًا
verses.translation: and during some of the night, and prostrate thyself before Him, and extol His limitless glory throughout the long night.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰؤُلَاءِ يُحِبُّونَ الْعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَاءَهُمْ يَوْمًا ثَقِيلًا
verses.translation: Behold, they [who are unmindful of God] love this fleeting life, and leave behind them [all thought of] a grief-laden Day.

verses.content: نَّحْنُ خَلَقْنَاهُمْ وَشَدَدْنَا أَسْرَهُمْ ۖ وَإِذَا شِئْنَا بَدَّلْنَا أَمْثَالَهُمْ تَبْدِيلًا
verses.translation: [They will not admit to themselves that] it We who have created them and strengthened their make - and [that] if it be Our will We can replace them entirely with others of their kind.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِ تَذْكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَن شَاءَ اتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِ سَبِيلًا
verses.translation: VERILY, all this is an admonition: whoever, then, so wills, may unto his Sustainer find a way.

verses.content: وَمَا تَشَاءُونَ إِلَّا أَن يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا
verses.translation: But you cannot will it unless God wills [to show you that way]: for, behold, God is indeed all-seeing, wise.

verses.content: يُدْخِلُ مَن يَشَاءُ فِي رَحْمَتِهِ ۚ وَالظَّالِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
verses.translation: He admits unto His grace everyone who wills [to be admitted]; but as for the evildoers - for them has He readied grievous suffering [in the life to come].

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالْمُرْسَلَاتِ عُرْفًا
verses.translation: CONSIDER these [messages,] sent forth in waves

verses.content: فَالْعَاصِفَاتِ عَصْفًا
verses.translation: and then storming on with a tempest's force!

verses.content: وَالنَّاشِرَاتِ نَشْرًا
verses.translation: Consider these [messages] that spread [the truth] far and wide,

verses.content: فَالْفَارِقَاتِ فَرْقًا
verses.translation: thus separating [right and wrong] with all clarity,

verses.content: فَالْمُلْقِيَاتِ ذِكْرًا
verses.translation: and then giving forth a reminder,

verses.content: عُذْرًا أَوْ نُذْرًا
verses.translation: [promising] freedom from blame or [offering] a warning!

verses.content: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَوَاقِعٌ
verses.translation: BEHOLD, all that you are told to expect will surely come to pass.

verses.content: فَإِذَا النُّجُومُ طُمِسَتْ
verses.translation: Thus, [it will come to pass] when the stars are effaced,

verses.content: وَإِذَا السَّمَاءُ فُرِجَتْ
verses.translation: and when the sky is rent asunder,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْجِبَالُ نُسِفَتْ
verses.translation: and when the mountains are scattered like dust,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الرُّسُلُ أُقِّتَتْ
verses.translation: and when all the apostles are called together at a time appointed...

verses.content: لِأَيِّ يَوْمٍ أُجِّلَتْ
verses.translation: For what day has the term [of all this] been set?

verses.content: لِيَوْمِ الْفَصْلِ
verses.translation: For the Day of Distinction [between the true and the false]!

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الْفَصْلِ
verses.translation: And what could make thee conceive what that Day of Distinction will be?

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on that Day unto those who give the lie to the truth!

verses.content: أَلَمْ نُهْلِكِ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: Did We not destroy [so many of] those [sinners] of olden days?

verses.content: ثُمَّ نُتْبِعُهُمُ الْآخِرِينَ
verses.translation: And We shall let them be followed by those of later times:

verses.content: كَذَٰلِكَ نَفْعَلُ بِالْمُجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: [for] thus do We deal with such as are lost in sin.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on that Day unto those who give the lie to the truth!

verses.content: أَلَمْ نَخْلُقكُّم مِّن مَّاءٍ مَّهِينٍ
verses.translation: Did We not create you out of a humble fluid

verses.content: فَجَعَلْنَاهُ فِي قَرَارٍ مَّكِينٍ
verses.translation: which We then let remain in [the womb's] firm keeping

verses.content: إِلَىٰ قَدَرٍ مَّعْلُومٍ
verses.translation: for a term pre-ordained?

verses.content: فَقَدَرْنَا فَنِعْمَ الْقَادِرُونَ
verses.translation: Thus have We determined [the nature of man's creation]: and excellent indeed is Our power to determine [what is to be]!

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe, on that Day unto those who give the lie to the truth!

verses.content: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ الْأَرْضَ كِفَاتًا
verses.translation: Have We not caused the earth to hold within itself

verses.content: أَحْيَاءً وَأَمْوَاتًا
verses.translation: the living and the dead?

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا رَوَاسِيَ شَامِخَاتٍ وَأَسْقَيْنَاكُم مَّاءً فُرَاتًا
verses.translation: and have We not set on it proud, firm mountains, and given you sweet water to drink?

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on that Day unto those who give the lie to the truth!

verses.content: انطَلِقُوا إِلَىٰ مَا كُنتُم بِهِ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: GO ON towards that [resurrection] which you were wont to call a lie!

verses.content: انطَلِقُوا إِلَىٰ ظِلٍّ ذِي ثَلَاثِ شُعَبٍ
verses.translation: Go on towards the threefold shadow

verses.content: لَّا ظَلِيلٍ وَلَا يُغْنِي مِنَ اللَّهَبِ
verses.translation: that will offer no [cooling] shade and will be of no avail against the flame

verses.content: إِنَّهَا تَرْمِي بِشَرَرٍ كَالْقَصْرِ
verses.translation: which – behold!- will throw up sparks like [burning] logs,

verses.content: كَأَنَّهُ جِمَالَتٌ صُفْرٌ
verses.translation: like giant fiery ropes!

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on that Day unto those who give the lie to the truth –

verses.content: هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ لَا يَنطِقُونَ
verses.translation: that Day on which they will not [be able to] utter a word,

verses.content: وَلَا يُؤْذَنُ لَهُمْ فَيَعْتَذِرُونَ
verses.translation: nor be allowed to proffer excuses!

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on that Day unto those who give the lie to the truth –

verses.content: هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ الْفَصْلِ ۖ جَمَعْنَاكُمْ وَالْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: that Day of Distinction [between the true and the false, when they will be told]: "We have brought you together with those [sinners] of olden times;

verses.content: فَإِن كَانَ لَكُمْ كَيْدٌ فَكِيدُونِ
verses.translation: and if you [think that you] have a subterfuge left, try to outwit Me!"

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on that Day unto those who give the lie to the truth!

verses.content: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي ظِلَالٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.translation: [AS AGAINST this,] behold, the God-conscious shall dwell amidst [cooling] shades and springs,

verses.content: وَفَوَاكِهَ مِمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
verses.translation: and [partake of] whatever fruit they may desire;

verses.content: كُلُوا وَاشْرَبُوا هَنِيئًا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: [and they will be told:] "Eat and drink in good cheer in return for what you did [in life]!"

verses.content: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: Thus, behold, do We reward the doers of good;

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: [but] woe on that Day unto those who give the lie to the truth!

verses.content: كُلُوا وَتَمَتَّعُوا قَلِيلًا إِنَّكُم مُّجْرِمُونَ
verses.translation: EAT [your fill] and enjoy your life for a little while, O you who are lost in sin!

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: [But] woe on that Day unto those who give the lie to the truth,

verses.content: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ارْكَعُوا لَا يَرْكَعُونَ
verses.translation: and when they are told, "Bow down [before God]", do not bow down:

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: woe on that Day unto those who give the to the truth!

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ حَدِيثٍ بَعْدَهُ يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: In what other tiding, then, will they, after this, believe?

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ عَمَّ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ
verses.translation: ABOUT WHAT do they [most often] ask one another?

verses.content: عَنِ النَّبَإِ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: About the awesome tiding [of resurrection],

verses.content: الَّذِي هُمْ فِيهِ مُخْتَلِفُونَ
verses.translation: on which they [so utterly] disagree.

verses.content: كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Nay, but in time they will come to understand [it]!

verses.content: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: And once again: Nay, but in time they will come to understand!

verses.content: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ الْأَرْضَ مِهَادًا
verses.translation: HAVE WE NOT made the earth a resting-place [for you],

verses.content: وَالْجِبَالَ أَوْتَادًا
verses.translation: and the mountains [its] pegs?

verses.content: وَخَلَقْنَاكُمْ أَزْوَاجًا
verses.translation: And We have created you in pairs;

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا نَوْمَكُمْ سُبَاتًا
verses.translation: and We have made your sleep [a symbol of] death

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا اللَّيْلَ لِبَاسًا
verses.translation: and made the night [its] cloak

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا النَّهَارَ مَعَاشًا
verses.translation: and made the day [a symbol of] life.

verses.content: وَبَنَيْنَا فَوْقَكُمْ سَبْعًا شِدَادًا
verses.translation: And We have built above you seven firmaments,

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا سِرَاجًا وَهَّاجًا
verses.translation: and have placed [therein the sun,] a lamp full of blazing splendour.

verses.content: وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ الْمُعْصِرَاتِ مَاءً ثَجَّاجًا
verses.translation: And from the wind-driven clouds We send down waters pouring in abundance,

verses.content: لِّنُخْرِجَ بِهِ حَبًّا وَنَبَاتًا
verses.translation: so that We might bring forth thereby grain, and herbs,

verses.content: وَجَنَّاتٍ أَلْفَافًا
verses.translation: and gardens dense with follage.

verses.content: إِنَّ يَوْمَ الْفَصْلِ كَانَ مِيقَاتًا
verses.translation: VERILY, the Day of Distinction [between the true and the false] has indeed its appointed time:

verses.content: يَوْمَ يُنفَخُ فِي الصُّورِ فَتَأْتُونَ أَفْوَاجًا
verses.translation: the Day when the trumpet [of resurrection] is sounded and you all come forward in multitudes;

verses.content: وَفُتِحَتِ السَّمَاءُ فَكَانَتْ أَبْوَابًا
verses.translation: and when the skies are opened and become [as wide-flung] gates;

verses.content: وَسُيِّرَتِ الْجِبَالُ فَكَانَتْ سَرَابًا
verses.translation: and when the mountains are made to vanish as if they had been a mirage.

verses.content: إِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ كَانَتْ مِرْصَادًا
verses.translation: [On that Day,] verily, hell will lie in wait [for those who deny the truth] –

verses.content: لِّلطَّاغِينَ مَآبًا
verses.translation: a goal for all who are wont to transgress the bounds of what is right!

verses.content: لَّابِثِينَ فِيهَا أَحْقَابًا
verses.translation: In it shall they remain for a long time.

verses.content: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرْدًا وَلَا شَرَابًا
verses.translation: Neither coolness shall they taste therein nor any [thirst-quenching] drink –

verses.content: إِلَّا حَمِيمًا وَغَسَّاقًا
verses.translation: only burning despair and ice-cold darkness:

verses.content: جَزَاءً وِفَاقًا
verses.translation: a meet requital [for their sins]!

verses.content: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا لَا يَرْجُونَ حِسَابًا
verses.translation: Behold, they were not expecting to be called to account,

verses.content: وَكَذَّبُوا بِآيَاتِنَا كِذَّابًا
verses.translation: having given the lie to Our messages one and all:

verses.content: وَكُلَّ شَيْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَاهُ كِتَابًا
verses.translation: but We have placed on record every single thing [of what they did].

verses.content: فَذُوقُوا فَلَن نَّزِيدَكُمْ إِلَّا عَذَابًا
verses.translation: [And so We shall say:] "Taste, then, [the fruit of your evil doings,] for now We shall bestow on you nothing but more and more suffering!"

verses.content: إِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ مَفَازًا
verses.translation: [But,] verily for the God-conscious there is supreme fulfilment in store:

verses.content: حَدَائِقَ وَأَعْنَابًا
verses.translation: luxuriant gardens and vinyards,

verses.content: وَكَوَاعِبَ أَتْرَابًا
verses.translation: and splendid companions well matched,

verses.content: وَكَأْسًا دِهَاقًا
verses.translation: and a cup [of happiness] overflowing.

verses.content: لَّا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًا وَلَا كِذَّابًا
verses.translation: No empty talk will they hear in that [paradise], nor any lie.

verses.content: جَزَاءً مِّن رَّبِّكَ عَطَاءً حِسَابًا
verses.translation: [All this will be] a reward from thy Sustainer, a gift in accordance with [His Own] reckoning –

verses.content: رَّبِّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا الرَّحْمَـٰنِ ۖ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ مِنْهُ خِطَابًا
verses.translation: [a reward from] the Sustainer of the heavens and the earth and all that is between them, the Most Gracious! [And] none shall have it in their power to raise their voices unto Him

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ الرُّوحُ وَالْمَلَائِكَةُ صَفًّا ۖ لَّا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُ الرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابًا
verses.translation: on the Day when all [human] souls and all the angels will stand up in ranks: none will speak but he to whom the Most Gracious will have given leave; and [everyone] will say [only] what is right.

verses.content: ذَٰلِكَ الْيَوْمُ الْحَقُّ ۖ فَمَن شَاءَ اتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِ مَآبًا
verses.translation: That will be the Day of Ultimate Truth: whoever wills, then, let him take the path that leads towards his Sustainer!

verses.content: إِنَّا أَنذَرْنَاكُمْ عَذَابًا قَرِيبًا يَوْمَ يَنظُرُ الْمَرْءُ مَا قَدَّمَتْ يَدَاهُ وَيَقُولُ الْكَافِرُ يَا لَيْتَنِي كُنتُ تُرَابًا
verses.translation: Verily, We have warned you of suffering near at hand - [suffering] on the Day when man shall [clearly] see what his hands have sent ahead, and when he who has denied the truth shall say, "Oh, would that I were mere dust...!"

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالنَّازِعَاتِ غَرْقًا
verses.translation: CONSIDER those [stars] that rise only to set,

verses.content: وَالنَّاشِطَاتِ نَشْطًا
verses.translation: and move [in their orbits] with steady motion,

verses.content: وَالسَّابِحَاتِ سَبْحًا
verses.translation: and float [through space] with floating serene,

verses.content: فَالسَّابِقَاتِ سَبْقًا
verses.translation: and yet overtake [one another] with swift overtaking:

verses.content: فَالْمُدَبِّرَاتِ أَمْرًا
verses.translation: and thus they fulfil the [Creator's] behest!

verses.content: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ الرَّاجِفَةُ
verses.translation: [HENCE, think of] the Day when a violent convulsion will convulse [the world],

verses.content: تَتْبَعُهَا الرَّادِفَةُ
verses.translation: to be followed by further [convulsions]!

verses.content: قُلُوبٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ وَاجِفَةٌ
verses.translation: On that Day will [men's] hearts be throbbing,

verses.content: أَبْصَارُهَا خَاشِعَةٌ
verses.translation: [and] their eyes downcast...

verses.content: يَقُولُونَ أَإِنَّا لَمَرْدُودُونَ فِي الْحَافِرَةِ
verses.translation: [And yet,] some say, "What! Are we indeed to be restored to our former state –

verses.content: أَإِذَا كُنَّا عِظَامًا نَّخِرَةً
verses.translation: even though we may have become [a heap of] crumbling bones?"

verses.content: قَالُوا تِلْكَ إِذًا كَرَّةٌ خَاسِرَةٌ
verses.translation: [And] they add, "That, then, would be a return with loss!"

verses.content: فَإِنَّمَا هِيَ زَجْرَةٌ وَاحِدَةٌ
verses.translation: [But,] then, that [Last Hour] will be [upon them of a sudden, as if it were] but a single accusing cry -

verses.content: فَإِذَا هُم بِالسَّاهِرَةِ
verses.translation: and then, lo, they will be fully awakened [to the truth]!

verses.content: هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ مُوسَىٰ
verses.translation: HAS THE STORY of Moses ever come within thy ken.

verses.content: إِذْ نَادَاهُ رَبُّهُ بِالْوَادِ الْمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى
verses.translation: Lo! His Sustainer called out to him in the twice-hallowed valley:

verses.content: اذْهَبْ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّهُ طَغَىٰ
verses.translation: "Go unto Pharaoh - for, verily, he has transgressed all bounds of what is right -

verses.content: فَقُلْ هَل لَّكَ إِلَىٰ أَن تَزَكَّىٰ
verses.translation: and say [unto him], 'Art thou desirous of attaining to purity?

verses.content: وَأَهْدِيَكَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَتَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: [If so,] then I shall guide thee towards [a cognition of] thy Sustainer, so that [henceforth] thou wilt stand in awe [of Him].’"

verses.content: فَأَرَاهُ الْآيَةَ الْكُبْرَىٰ
verses.translation: And thereupon he [went to Pharaoh and] made him aware of the great wonder [of God's grace].

verses.content: فَكَذَّبَ وَعَصَىٰ
verses.translation: But [Pharaoh] gave him the lie and rebelliously rejected [all guidance],

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ يَسْعَىٰ
verses.translation: and brusquely turned his back [on Moses];

verses.content: فَحَشَرَ فَنَادَىٰ
verses.translation: and then he gathered [his great ones], and called [unto his people],

verses.content: فَقَالَ أَنَا رَبُّكُمُ الْأَعْلَىٰ
verses.translation: and said, "I am your Lord All-Highest!"

verses.content: فَأَخَذَهُ اللَّهُ نَكَالَ الْآخِرَةِ وَالْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: And thereupon God took him to task, [and made him] a warning example in the life to come as well as in this world.

verses.content: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبْرَةً لِّمَن يَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: In this, behold, there is a lesson indeed for all who stand in awe [of God].

verses.content: أَأَنتُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَمِ السَّمَاءُ ۚ بَنَاهَا
verses.translation: [O MEN!] Are you more difficult to create than the heaven which He has built?

verses.content: رَفَعَ سَمْكَهَا فَسَوَّاهَا
verses.translation: High has He reared its vault and formed it in accordance with what it was meant to be;

verses.content: وَأَغْطَشَ لَيْلَهَا وَأَخْرَجَ ضُحَاهَا
verses.translation: and He has made dark its night and brought forth its light of day.

verses.content: وَالْأَرْضَ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ دَحَاهَا
verses.translation: And after that, the earth: wide has He spread its expanse,

verses.content: أَخْرَجَ مِنْهَا مَاءَهَا وَمَرْعَاهَا
verses.translation: and has caused its waters to come out of it, and its pastures,

verses.content: وَالْجِبَالَ أَرْسَاهَا
verses.translation: and has made the mountains firm:

verses.content: مَتَاعًا لَّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَامِكُمْ
verses.translation: [all this] as a means of livelihood for you and your animals.

verses.content: فَإِذَا جَاءَتِ الطَّامَّةُ الْكُبْرَىٰ
verses.translation: AND SO, when the great overwhelming event [of, resurrection] comes to pass –

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَتَذَكَّرُ الْإِنسَانُ مَا سَعَىٰ
verses.translation: on that Day man will [clearly] remember all that he has ever wrought;

verses.content: وَبُرِّزَتِ الْجَحِيمُ لِمَن يَرَىٰ
verses.translation: and the blazing fire [of hell] will be lad open before all who [are destined to] see it.

verses.content: فَأَمَّا مَن طَغَىٰ
verses.translation: For, unto him who shall have transgressed the bounds of what is right,

verses.content: وَآثَرَ الْحَيَاةَ الدُّنْيَا
verses.translation: and preferred the life of this world [to the good of his soul],

verses.content: فَإِنَّ الْجَحِيمَ هِيَ الْمَأْوَىٰ
verses.translation: that blazing fire will truly be the goal!

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِ وَنَهَى النَّفْسَ عَنِ الْهَوَىٰ
verses.translation: But unto him who shall have stood in fear of his Sustainer's Presence, and held back his inner self from base desires,

verses.content: فَإِنَّ الْجَنَّةَ هِيَ الْمَأْوَىٰ
verses.translation: paradise will truly be the goal!

verses.content: يَسْأَلُونَكَ عَنِ السَّاعَةِ أَيَّانَ مُرْسَاهَا
verses.translation: THEY WILL ASK thee [O Prophet] about the Last Hour: "When will it come to pass?"

verses.content: فِيمَ أَنتَ مِن ذِكْرَاهَا
verses.translation: [But] how couldst thou tell anything about it,

verses.content: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ مُنتَهَاهَا
verses.translation: [seeing that] with thy Sustainer alone rests the beginning and the end [of all knowledge] thereof?

verses.content: إِنَّمَا أَنتَ مُنذِرُ مَن يَخْشَاهَا
verses.translation: Thou art but [sent] to warn those who stand in awe of it.

verses.content: كَأَنَّهُمْ يَوْمَ يَرَوْنَهَا لَمْ يَلْبَثُوا إِلَّا عَشِيَّةً أَوْ ضُحَاهَا
verses.translation: On the Day when they behold it, [it will seem to them] as if they had tarried [in this world] no longer than one evening or [one night, ending with] its morn!

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ عَبَسَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: HE FROWNED and turned away

verses.content: أَن جَاءَهُ الْأَعْمَىٰ
verses.translation: because the blind man approached him!

verses.content: وَمَا يُدْرِيكَ لَعَلَّهُ يَزَّكَّىٰ
verses.translation: Yet for all thou didst know, [O Muhammad,] he might perhaps have grown in purity,

verses.content: أَوْ يَذَّكَّرُ فَتَنفَعَهُ الذِّكْرَىٰ
verses.translation: or have been reminded [of the truth], and helped by this reminder.

verses.content: أَمَّا مَنِ اسْتَغْنَىٰ
verses.translation: Now as for him who believes himself to be self-sufficient

verses.content: فَأَنتَ لَهُ تَصَدَّىٰ
verses.translation: to him didst thou give thy whole attention,

verses.content: وَمَا عَلَيْكَ أَلَّا يَزَّكَّىٰ
verses.translation: although thou art not accountable for his failure to attain to purity;

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَن جَاءَكَ يَسْعَىٰ
verses.translation: but as for him who came unto thee full of eagerness

verses.content: وَهُوَ يَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: and in awe [of God]

verses.content: فَأَنتَ عَنْهُ تَلَهَّىٰ
verses.translation: him didst thou disregard!

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّهَا تَذْكِرَةٌ
verses.translation: NAY, VERILY, these [messages] are but a reminder:

verses.content: فَمَن شَاءَ ذَكَرَهُ
verses.translation: and so, whoever is willing may remember Him

verses.content: فِي صُحُفٍ مُّكَرَّمَةٍ
verses.translation: in [the light of His] revelations blest with dignity,

verses.content: مَّرْفُوعَةٍ مُّطَهَّرَةٍ
verses.translation: lofty and pure,

verses.content: بِأَيْدِي سَفَرَةٍ
verses.translation: [borne] by the hands of messengers

verses.content: كِرَامٍ بَرَرَةٍ
verses.translation: noble and most virtuous.

verses.content: قُتِلَ الْإِنسَانُ مَا أَكْفَرَهُ
verses.translation: [But only too often] man destroys himself: how stubbornly does he deny the truth!

verses.content: مِنْ أَيِّ شَيْءٍ خَلَقَهُ
verses.translation: [Does man ever consider] out of what substance [God] creates him?

verses.content: مِن نُّطْفَةٍ خَلَقَهُ فَقَدَّرَهُ
verses.translation: Out of a drop of sperm He creates him, and thereupon determines his nature,

verses.content: ثُمَّ السَّبِيلَ يَسَّرَهُ
verses.translation: and then makes it easy for him to go through life;

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَمَاتَهُ فَأَقْبَرَهُ
verses.translation: and in the end He causes him to die and brings him to the grave;

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِذَا شَاءَ أَنشَرَهُ
verses.translation: and then, if it be His will, He shall raise him again to life,

verses.content: كَلَّا لَمَّا يَقْضِ مَا أَمَرَهُ
verses.translation: Nay, but [man] has never yet fulfilled what He has enjoined upon him!

verses.content: فَلْيَنظُرِ الْإِنسَانُ إِلَىٰ طَعَامِهِ
verses.translation: Let man, then, consider [the sources of] his food:

verses.content: أَنَّا صَبَبْنَا الْمَاءَ صَبًّا
verses.translation: [how it is] that We pour down water, pouring it down abundantly;

verses.content: ثُمَّ شَقَقْنَا الْأَرْضَ شَقًّا
verses.translation: and then We cleave the earth [with new growth], cleaving it asunder,

verses.content: فَأَنبَتْنَا فِيهَا حَبًّا
verses.translation: and thereupon We cause grain to grow out of it,

verses.content: وَعِنَبًا وَقَضْبًا
verses.translation: and vines and edible plants,

verses.content: وَزَيْتُونًا وَنَخْلًا
verses.translation: and olive trees and date-palms,

verses.content: وَحَدَائِقَ غُلْبًا
verses.translation: and gardens dense with foliage,

verses.content: وَفَاكِهَةً وَأَبًّا
verses.translation: and fruits and herbage,

verses.content: مَّتَاعًا لَّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَامِكُمْ
verses.translation: for you and for your animals to enjoy.

verses.content: فَإِذَا جَاءَتِ الصَّاخَّةُ
verses.translation: AND SO, when the piercing call [of resurrection] is heard

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَفِرُّ الْمَرْءُ مِنْ أَخِيهِ
verses.translation: on a Day when everyone will [want to] flee from his brother,

verses.content: وَأُمِّهِ وَأَبِيهِ
verses.translation: and from his mother and father,

verses.content: وَصَاحِبَتِهِ وَبَنِيهِ
verses.translation: and from his spouse and his children:

verses.content: لِكُلِّ امْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ شَأْنٌ يُغْنِيهِ
verses.translation: on that Day, to every one of them will his own state be of sufficient concern.

verses.content: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ مُّسْفِرَةٌ
verses.translation: Some faces will on that Day be bright with happiness,

verses.content: ضَاحِكَةٌ مُّسْتَبْشِرَةٌ
verses.translation: laughing, rejoicing at glad tidings.

verses.content: وَوُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَلَيْهَا غَبَرَةٌ
verses.translation: And some faces will on that Day with dust be covered,

verses.content: تَرْهَقُهَا قَتَرَةٌ
verses.translation: with darkness overspread:

verses.content: أُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الْكَفَرَةُ الْفَجَرَةُ
verses.translation: these, these will be the ones who denied the truth and were immersed in iniquity!

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا الشَّمْسُ كُوِّرَتْ
verses.translation: WHEN THE SUN is shrouded in darkness,

verses.content: وَإِذَا النُّجُومُ انكَدَرَتْ
verses.translation: and when the stars lose their light,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْجِبَالُ سُيِّرَتْ
verses.translation: and when the mountains are made to vanish,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْعِشَارُ عُطِّلَتْ
verses.translation: and when she-camels big with young, about to give birth, are left untended,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْوُحُوشُ حُشِرَتْ
verses.translation: and when all beasts are gathered together,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْبِحَارُ سُجِّرَتْ
verses.translation: and when the seas boil over,

verses.content: وَإِذَا النُّفُوسُ زُوِّجَتْ
verses.translation: and when all human beings are coupled [with their deeds],

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْمَوْءُودَةُ سُئِلَتْ
verses.translation: and when the girl-child that was buried alive is made to ask

verses.content: بِأَيِّ ذَنبٍ قُتِلَتْ
verses.translation: for what crime she had been slain,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الصُّحُفُ نُشِرَتْ
verses.translation: and when the scrolls [of men's deeds] are unfolded,

verses.content: وَإِذَا السَّمَاءُ كُشِطَتْ
verses.translation: and when heaven is laid bare,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْجَحِيمُ سُعِّرَتْ
verses.translation: and when the blazing fire [of hell] is kindled bright,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْجَنَّةُ أُزْلِفَتْ
verses.translation: and when paradise is brought into view:

verses.content: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌ مَّا أَحْضَرَتْ
verses.translation: [on that Day] every human being will come to know what he has prepared [for himself].

verses.content: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِالْخُنَّسِ
verses.translation: BUT NAY! I call to witness the revolving stars,

verses.content: الْجَوَارِ الْكُنَّسِ
verses.translation: the planets that run their course and set,

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا عَسْعَسَ
verses.translation: and the night as it darkly falls,

verses.content: وَالصُّبْحِ إِذَا تَنَفَّسَ
verses.translation: and the morn as it softly breathes:

verses.content: إِنَّهُ لَقَوْلُ رَسُولٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.translation: behold, this [divine writ] is indeed the [inspired] word of a noble apostle,

verses.content: ذِي قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِي الْعَرْشِ مَكِينٍ
verses.translation: with strength endowed, secure with Him who in almightiness is enthroned

verses.content: مُّطَاعٍ ثَمَّ أَمِينٍ
verses.translation: [the word] of one to be heeded, and worthy of trust!

verses.content: وَمَا صَاحِبُكُم بِمَجْنُونٍ
verses.translation: For, this fellow-man of yours is not a madman:

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ رَآهُ بِالْأُفُقِ الْمُبِينِ
verses.translation: he truly beheld [the angel - beheld] him on the clear horizon;

verses.content: وَمَا هُوَ عَلَى الْغَيْبِ بِضَنِينٍ
verses.translation: and he is not one to begrudge others the knowledge [of whatever has been revealed to him] out of that which is beyond the reach of human Perception.

verses.content: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَيْطَانٍ رَّجِيمٍ
verses.translation: Nor is this [message] the word of any satanic force accursed.

verses.content: فَأَيْنَ تَذْهَبُونَ
verses.translation: Whither, then, will you go?

verses.content: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِّلْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: This [message] is no less than a reminder to all mankind –

verses.content: لِمَن شَاءَ مِنكُمْ أَن يَسْتَقِيمَ
verses.translation: to everyone of you who wills to walk a straight way.

verses.content: وَمَا تَشَاءُونَ إِلَّا أَن يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ رَبُّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: But you cannot will it unless God, the Sustainer of all the worlds, wills [to show you that way].

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا السَّمَاءُ انفَطَرَتْ
verses.translation: WHEN THE SKY is cleft asunder,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْكَوَاكِبُ انتَثَرَتْ
verses.translation: and when the stars are scattered,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْبِحَارُ فُجِّرَتْ
verses.translation: and when the seas burst beyond their bounds,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْقُبُورُ بُعْثِرَتْ
verses.translation: and when the graves are overturned –

verses.content: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌ مَّا قَدَّمَتْ وَأَخَّرَتْ
verses.translation: every human being will [at last] comprehend, what he has sent ahead and what he has held back [in this world].

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الْإِنسَانُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ الْكَرِيمِ
verses.translation: O MAN! What is it that lures thee away from thy bountiful Sustainer,

verses.content: الَّذِي خَلَقَكَ فَسَوَّاكَ فَعَدَلَكَ
verses.translation: who has created thee, and formed thee in accordance with what thou art meant' to be, and shaped thy nature in just proportions,

verses.content: فِي أَيِّ صُورَةٍ مَّا شَاءَ رَكَّبَكَ
verses.translation: having put thee together in whatever form He willed [thee to have]?

verses.content: كَلَّا بَلْ تُكَذِّبُونَ بِالدِّينِ
verses.translation: Nay, [O men,] but you [are lured away from God whenever you are tempted to] give the lie to [God’s] Judgment!

verses.content: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكُمْ لَحَافِظِينَ
verses.translation: And yet, verily, there are ever-watchful forces over you,

verses.content: كِرَامًا كَاتِبِينَ
verses.translation: noble, recording,

verses.content: يَعْلَمُونَ مَا تَفْعَلُونَ
verses.translation: aware of whatever you do!

verses.content: إِنَّ الْأَبْرَارَ لَفِي نَعِيمٍ
verses.translation: Behold, [in the life to come] the truly virtuous: will indeed be in bliss,

verses.content: وَإِنَّ الْفُجَّارَ لَفِي جَحِيمٍ
verses.translation: whereas, behold, the wicked will indeed be in a blazing fire –

verses.content: يَصْلَوْنَهَا يَوْمَ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: [a fire] which they shall enter on Judgment Day,

verses.content: وَمَا هُمْ عَنْهَا بِغَائِبِينَ
verses.translation: and which they shall not [be able to] evade.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: And what could make thee conceive what that Judgment Day will be?

verses.content: ثُمَّ مَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: And once again: What could make thee conceive what that Judgment Day will be?

verses.content: يَوْمَ لَا تَمْلِكُ نَفْسٌ لِّنَفْسٍ شَيْئًا ۖ وَالْأَمْرُ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلَّهِ
verses.translation: [It will be] a Day when no human being shall be of the least avail to another human being: for on that Day [it will become manifest that] all sovereignty is God's alone.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَيْلٌ لِّلْمُطَفِّفِينَ
verses.translation: WOE UNTO THOSE who give short measure:

verses.content: الَّذِينَ إِذَا اكْتَالُوا عَلَى النَّاسِ يَسْتَوْفُونَ
verses.translation: those who, when they are to receive their due from [other] people, demand that it be given in full –

verses.content: وَإِذَا كَالُوهُمْ أَو وَّزَنُوهُمْ يُخْسِرُونَ
verses.translation: but when they have to measure or weigh whatever they owe to others, give less than what is due!

verses.content: أَلَا يَظُنُّ أُولَـٰئِكَ أَنَّهُم مَّبْعُوثُونَ
verses.translation: Do they not know that they are bound to be raised from the dead

verses.content: لِيَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
verses.translation: [and called to account] on an awesome Day –

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ النَّاسُ لِرَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: the Day when all men shall stand before the Sustainer of all the worlds?

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّ كِتَابَ الْفُجَّارِ لَفِي سِجِّينٍ
verses.translation: NAY, VERILY, the record of the wicked is indeed [set down] in a mode inescapable!

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا سِجِّينٌ
verses.translation: And what could make thee conceive what that that mode inescapable will be?

verses.content: كِتَابٌ مَّرْقُومٌ
verses.translation: A record [indelibly] inscribed!

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on that Day unto those who give the lie to the truth –

verses.content: الَّذِينَ يُكَذِّبُونَ بِيَوْمِ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: those who give the lie to the [coming of] Judgment Day:

verses.content: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعْتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ
verses.translation: for, none gives the lie to it but such as are wont to transgress against all that is [and are] immersed in sin:

verses.content: إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ آيَاتُنَا قَالَ أَسَاطِيرُ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: [and so,] whenever Our messages are conveyed to them, they but say, "Fables of ancient times!"

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ بَلْ ۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُوا يَكْسِبُونَ
verses.translation: Nay, but their hearts are corroded by all [the evil] that they were wont to do!

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّهُمْ عَن رَّبِّهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَّمَحْجُوبُونَ
verses.translation: Nay, verily, from [the grace of] their Sustainer shall they on that Day be debarred;

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِنَّهُمْ لَصَالُو الْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: and then, behold, they shall enter the blazing fire

verses.content: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَـٰذَا الَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: and be told: "This is the [very thing] to which you were wont to give the lie!"

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّ كِتَابَ الْأَبْرَارِ لَفِي عِلِّيِّينَ
verses.translation: NAY, VERILY - the record of the truly virtuous is [set down] in a mode most lofty!

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا عِلِّيُّونَ
verses.translation: And what could make thee conceive what that mode most lofty will be?

verses.content: كِتَابٌ مَّرْقُومٌ
verses.translation: A record [indelibly] inscribed,

verses.content: يَشْهَدُهُ الْمُقَرَّبُونَ
verses.translation: witnessed~ by all who have [ever] been drawn close unto God.

verses.content: إِنَّ الْأَبْرَارَ لَفِي نَعِيمٍ
verses.translation: Behold, [in the life to come] the truly virtuous will indeed be in bliss:

verses.content: عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: [resting on couches, they will look up [to God]:

verses.content: تَعْرِفُ فِي وُجُوهِهِمْ نَضْرَةَ النَّعِيمِ
verses.translation: upon their faces thou wilt see the brightness of bliss.

verses.content: يُسْقَوْنَ مِن رَّحِيقٍ مَّخْتُومٍ
verses.translation: They will be given a drink of pure wine whereon the seal [of God] will have been set,

verses.content: خِتَامُهُ مِسْكٌ ۚ وَفِي ذَٰلِكَ فَلْيَتَنَافَسِ الْمُتَنَافِسُونَ
verses.translation: pouring forth with a fragrance of musk. To that [wine of paradise], then, let all such aspire as [are willing to] aspire to things of high account:

verses.content: وَمِزَاجُهُ مِن تَسْنِيمٍ
verses.translation: for it is composed of all that is most exalting

verses.content: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا الْمُقَرَّبُونَ
verses.translation: a source [of bliss] whereof those who are drawn close unto God shall drink.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ أَجْرَمُوا كَانُوا مِنَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا يَضْحَكُونَ
verses.translation: BEHOLD, those who have abandoned themselves to sin are wont to laugh at such as have attained to faith

verses.content: وَإِذَا مَرُّوا بِهِمْ يَتَغَامَزُونَ
verses.translation: and whenever they pass by them, they wink at one another [derisively];

verses.content: وَإِذَا انقَلَبُوا إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِمُ انقَلَبُوا فَكِهِينَ
verses.translation: and whenever they return to people of their own kind, they return full of jests;

verses.content: وَإِذَا رَأَوْهُمْ قَالُوا إِنَّ هَـٰؤُلَاءِ لَضَالُّونَ
verses.translation: and whenever they see those [who believe,] they say, "Behold, these [people] have indeed gone astray!"

verses.content: وَمَا أُرْسِلُوا عَلَيْهِمْ حَافِظِينَ
verses.translation: And, withal, they have no call to watch over [the beliefs of] others...

verses.content: فَالْيَوْمَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا مِنَ الْكُفَّارِ يَضْحَكُونَ
verses.translation: But on the Day [of Judgment], they who had attained to faith will [be able to] laugh at the [erstwhile] deniers of the truth:

verses.content: عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: [for, resting in paradise] on couches, they will look on [and say to themselves]:

verses.content: هَلْ ثُوِّبَ الْكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُوا يَفْعَلُونَ
verses.translation: "Are these deniers of the truth being [thus] requited for [aught but] what they were wont to do?"

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا السَّمَاءُ انشَقَّتْ
verses.translation: WHEN THE SKY is split asunder,

verses.content: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
verses.translation: obeying its Sustainer, as in truth it must;

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْأَرْضُ مُدَّتْ
verses.translation: and when the earth is leveled,

verses.content: وَأَلْقَتْ مَا فِيهَا وَتَخَلَّتْ
verses.translation: and casts forth whatever is in it, and becomes utterly void,

verses.content: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
verses.translation: obeying its Sustainer, as in truth it must -:

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الْإِنسَانُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدْحًا فَمُلَاقِيهِ
verses.translation: [then,] O man - thou [that] hast, verily, been toiling towards thy Sustainer in painful toil - then shalt thou meet Him!

verses.content: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِيَ كِتَابَهُ بِيَمِينِهِ
verses.translation: And as for him whose record shall be placed in his right hand,

verses.content: فَسَوْفَ يُحَاسَبُ حِسَابًا يَسِيرًا
verses.translation: he will in time be called to account with an easy accounting,

verses.content: وَيَنقَلِبُ إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِ مَسْرُورًا
verses.translation: and will [be able to] turn joyfully to those of his own kind.

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِيَ كِتَابَهُ وَرَاءَ ظَهْرِهِ
verses.translation: But as for him whose record shall be given to him behind his back;

verses.content: فَسَوْفَ يَدْعُو ثُبُورًا
verses.translation: he will in time pray for utter destruction:

verses.content: وَيَصْلَىٰ سَعِيرًا
verses.translation: but he will enter the blazing flame.

verses.content: إِنَّهُ كَانَ فِي أَهْلِهِ مَسْرُورًا
verses.translation: Behold, [in his earthly life] he lived joyfully among people of his own kind

verses.content: إِنَّهُ ظَنَّ أَن لَّن يَحُورَ
verses.translation: for, behold, he never thought that he would have to return [to God].

verses.content: بَلَىٰ إِنَّ رَبَّهُ كَانَ بِهِ بَصِيرًا
verses.translation: Yea indeed! His Sustainer did see all that was in him!

verses.content: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِالشَّفَقِ
verses.translation: BUT NAY! I call to witness the sunset's [fleeting] afterglow,

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ وَمَا وَسَقَ
verses.translation: and the night, and what it [step by step] unfolds,

verses.content: وَالْقَمَرِ إِذَا اتَّسَقَ
verses.translation: and the moon, as it grows to its fullness:

verses.content: لَتَرْكَبُنَّ طَبَقًا عَن طَبَقٍ
verses.translation: [even thus, O men,] are you bound to move; onward from stage to stage.

verses.content: فَمَا لَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: What, then, is amiss with them that they will not believe [in a life to come]?

verses.content: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيْهِمُ الْقُرْآنُ لَا يَسْجُدُونَ ۩
verses.translation: and [that], when the Qur’an is read unto them, they do not fall down in prostration?

verses.content: بَلِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا يُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: Nay, but they who are bent on denying the truth give the lie [to this divine writ]!

verses.content: وَاللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يُوعُونَ
verses.translation: Yet God has full knowledge of what they conceal [in their hearts].

verses.content: فَبَشِّرْهُم بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: Hence, give them the tiding of grievous suffering [in the life to come] –

verses.content: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ لَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ
verses.translation: unless it be such [of them] as [repent, and] attain to faith, and do good works: for theirs shall be a reward unending!.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالسَّمَاءِ ذَاتِ الْبُرُوجِ
verses.translation: CONSIDER the sky full of great constellations,

verses.content: وَالْيَوْمِ الْمَوْعُودِ
verses.translation: and [then bethink thyself of] the promised Day,

verses.content: وَشَاهِدٍ وَمَشْهُودٍ
verses.translation: and [of] Him who witnesses [all], and [of] that unto which witness is borne [by Him]!

verses.content: قُتِلَ أَصْحَابُ الْأُخْدُودِ
verses.translation: THEY DESTROY [but] themselves, they who would ready a pit

verses.content: النَّارِ ذَاتِ الْوَقُودِ
verses.translation: of fire fiercely burning [for all who have attained to faith]!

verses.content: إِذْ هُمْ عَلَيْهَا قُعُودٌ
verses.translation: Lo! [With glee do] they contemplate that [fire],

verses.content: وَهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفْعَلُونَ بِالْمُؤْمِنِينَ شُهُودٌ
verses.translation: fully conscious of what they are doing to the believers,

verses.content: وَمَا نَقَمُوا مِنْهُمْ إِلَّا أَن يُؤْمِنُوا بِاللَّهِ الْعَزِيزِ الْحَمِيدِ
verses.translation: whom they hate for no other reason than that they believe in God, the Almighty, the One to whom all praise is due,

verses.content: الَّذِي لَهُ مُلْكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ شَهِيدٌ
verses.translation: [and] to whom the dominion of the heavens and the earth belongs. But God is witness unto everything!

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ فَتَنُوا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَتُوبُوا فَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ الْحَرِيقِ
verses.translation: Verily, as for those who persecute believing men and believing women, and thereafter do not repent, hell's suffering awaits them: yea, suffering through fire awaits them!

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ لَهُمْ جَنَّاتٌ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ الْفَوْزُ الْكَبِيرُ
verses.translation: [But,] verily, they who attain to faith and do righteous deeds shall [in the life to come] have gardens through which running waters flow - that triumph most great!

verses.content: إِنَّ بَطْشَ رَبِّكَ لَشَدِيدٌ
verses.translation: VERILY, thy Sustainer's grip is exceedingly strong!

verses.content: إِنَّهُ هُوَ يُبْدِئُ وَيُعِيدُ
verses.translation: Behold, it is He who creates [man] in the first instance, and He [it is who] will bring him forth anew.

verses.content: وَهُوَ الْغَفُورُ الْوَدُودُ
verses.translation: And He alone is truly-forgiving, all-embracing in His love,

verses.content: ذُو الْعَرْشِ الْمَجِيدُ
verses.translation: in sublime almightiness enthroned,

verses.content: فَعَّالٌ لِّمَا يُرِيدُ
verses.translation: a sovereign doer of whatever He wills.

verses.content: هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ الْجُنُودِ
verses.translation: HAS IT ever come within thy ken, the story of the [sinful] hosts

verses.content: فِرْعَوْنَ وَثَمُودَ
verses.translation: of Pharaoh, and of [the tribe of] Thamud?

verses.content: بَلِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا فِي تَكْذِيبٍ
verses.translation: And yet, they who are bent on denying the truth persist in giving it the lie:

verses.content: وَاللَّهُ مِن وَرَائِهِم مُّحِيطٌ
verses.translation: but all the while God encompasses them [with His knowledge and might] without their being aware of it.

verses.content: بَلْ هُوَ قُرْآنٌ مَّجِيدٌ
verses.translation: Nay, but this [divine writ which they reject] is a discourse sublime,

verses.content: فِي لَوْحٍ مَّحْفُوظٍ
verses.translation: upon an imperishable tablet [inscribed].

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالسَّمَاءِ وَالطَّارِقِ
verses.translation: CONSIDER the heavens and that which comes in the night!

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الطَّارِقُ
verses.translation: And what could make thee conceive what it is that comes in the night?

verses.content: النَّجْمُ الثَّاقِبُ
verses.translation: It is the star that pierces through [life's] darkness:

verses.content: إِن كُلُّ نَفْسٍ لَّمَّا عَلَيْهَا حَافِظٌ
verses.translation: [for] no human being has ever been left unguarded.

verses.content: فَلْيَنظُرِ الْإِنسَانُ مِمَّ خُلِقَ
verses.translation: LET MAN, then, observe out of what he has been created:

verses.content: خُلِقَ مِن مَّاءٍ دَافِقٍ
verses.translation: he has been created out of a seminal fluid

verses.content: يَخْرُجُ مِن بَيْنِ الصُّلْبِ وَالتَّرَائِبِ
verses.translation: issuing from between the loins [of man] and the pelvic arch [of woman].

verses.content: إِنَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَجْعِهِ لَقَادِرٌ
verses.translation: Now, verily, He [who thus creates man in the first instance] is well able to bring him back [to life]

verses.content: يَوْمَ تُبْلَى السَّرَائِرُ
verses.translation: on the Day when all secrets will be laid bare,

verses.content: فَمَا لَهُ مِن قُوَّةٍ وَلَا نَاصِرٍ
verses.translation: and [man] will have neither strength nor helper!

verses.content: وَالسَّمَاءِ ذَاتِ الرَّجْعِ
verses.translation: Consider the heavens, ever-revolving,

verses.content: وَالْأَرْضِ ذَاتِ الصَّدْعِ
verses.translation: and the earth, bursting forth with plants!

verses.content: إِنَّهُ لَقَوْلٌ فَصْلٌ
verses.translation: BEHOLD, this [divine writ] is indeed a word that between truth and falsehood,

verses.content: وَمَا هُوَ بِالْهَزْلِ
verses.translation: and is no idle tale.

verses.content: إِنَّهُمْ يَكِيدُونَ كَيْدًا
verses.translation: Behold, they [who refuse to accept it] devise many a false argument [to disprove its truth];

verses.content: وَأَكِيدُ كَيْدًا
verses.translation: but I shall bring all their scheming to nought.

verses.content: فَمَهِّلِ الْكَافِرِينَ أَمْهِلْهُمْ رُوَيْدًا
verses.translation: Let, then, the deniers of the truth have their will: let them have their will for a little while.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ سَبِّحِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ الْأَعْلَى
verses.translation: EXTOL the limitless glory of thy Sustainer's name: [the glory of] the Al-Highest,

verses.content: الَّذِي خَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
verses.translation: who creates [every thing], and thereupon forms it in accordance with what it is meant to be,

verses.content: وَالَّذِي قَدَّرَ فَهَدَىٰ
verses.translation: and who determines the nature [of all that exists], and thereupon guides it [towards its fulfilment],

verses.content: وَالَّذِي أَخْرَجَ الْمَرْعَىٰ
verses.translation: and who brings forth herbage,

verses.content: فَجَعَلَهُ غُثَاءً أَحْوَىٰ
verses.translation: and thereupon causes it to decay into rust-brown stubble!

verses.content: سَنُقْرِئُكَ فَلَا تَنسَىٰ
verses.translation: WE SHALL teach thee, and thou wilt not forget [aught of what thou art taught],

verses.content: إِلَّا مَا شَاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُ يَعْلَمُ الْجَهْرَ وَمَا يَخْفَىٰ
verses.translation: save what God may will [thee to forget] - for, verily, He [alone] knows all that is open to [man's] perception as well as all that is hidden [from it]

verses.content: وَنُيَسِّرُكَ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ
verses.translation: and [thus] shall We make easy for thee the path towards [ultimate] ease.

verses.content: فَذَكِّرْ إِن نَّفَعَتِ الذِّكْرَىٰ
verses.translation: REMIND, THEN, [others of the truth, regardless of] whether this reminding [would seem to] be of use [or not]:

verses.content: سَيَذَّكَّرُ مَن يَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: in mind will keep it he who stands in awe [of God],

verses.content: وَيَتَجَنَّبُهَا الْأَشْقَى
verses.translation: but aloof from it will remain that most hapless wretch –

verses.content: الَّذِي يَصْلَى النَّارَ الْكُبْرَىٰ
verses.translation: he who [in the life to come] shall have to endure the great fire

verses.content: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحْيَىٰ
verses.translation: wherein he will neither die nor remain alive.

verses.content: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ
verses.translation: To happiness [in the life to come] will indeed attain he who attains to purity [in this world],

verses.content: وَذَكَرَ اسْمَ رَبِّهِ فَصَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: and remembers his Sustainer's name, and prays [unto Him].

verses.content: بَلْ تُؤْثِرُونَ الْحَيَاةَ الدُّنْيَا
verses.translation: But nay, [O men,] you prefer the life of this world,

verses.content: وَالْآخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ وَأَبْقَىٰ
verses.translation: although the life to come is better and more enduring.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَفِي الصُّحُفِ الْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: Verily, [all] this has indeed been [said] in the earlier revelations –

verses.content: صُحُفِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَمُوسَىٰ
verses.translation: the revelations of Abraham and Moses.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ الْغَاشِيَةِ
verses.translation: HAS THERE COME unto thee the tiding of the Overshadowing Event?'

verses.content: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ خَاشِعَةٌ
verses.translation: Some faces will on that Day be downcast,

verses.content: عَامِلَةٌ نَّاصِبَةٌ
verses.translation: toiling [under burdens of sin], worn out [by fear],

verses.content: تَصْلَىٰ نَارًا حَامِيَةً
verses.translation: about to enter a glowing fire,

verses.content: تُسْقَىٰ مِنْ عَيْنٍ آنِيَةٍ
verses.translation: given to drink from a boiling spring.

verses.content: لَّيْسَ لَهُمْ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِن ضَرِيعٍ
verses.translation: No food for them save the bitterness of dry thorns,

verses.content: لَّا يُسْمِنُ وَلَا يُغْنِي مِن جُوعٍ
verses.translation: which gives no strength and neither stills hunger.

verses.content: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ نَّاعِمَةٌ
verses.translation: [And] some faces will on that Day shine with bliss,

verses.content: لِّسَعْيِهَا رَاضِيَةٌ
verses.translation: well-pleased with [the fruit of] their striving,

verses.content: فِي جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٍ
verses.translation: in a garden sublime,

verses.content: لَّا تَسْمَعُ فِيهَا لَاغِيَةً
verses.translation: wherein thou wilt hear no empty talk.

verses.content: فِيهَا عَيْنٌ جَارِيَةٌ
verses.translation: Countless springs will flow therein,

verses.content: فِيهَا سُرُرٌ مَّرْفُوعَةٌ
verses.translation: [and] there will be thrones [of happiness] raised high,

verses.content: وَأَكْوَابٌ مَّوْضُوعَةٌ
verses.translation: and goblets placed ready,

verses.content: وَنَمَارِقُ مَصْفُوفَةٌ
verses.translation: and cushions ranged,

verses.content: وَزَرَابِيُّ مَبْثُوثَةٌ
verses.translation: and carpets spread out…

verses.content: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى الْإِبِلِ كَيْفَ خُلِقَتْ
verses.translation: DO, THEN, they [who deny resurrection] never gaze at the clouds pregnant with water, [and observe] how they are created?

verses.content: وَإِلَى السَّمَاءِ كَيْفَ رُفِعَتْ
verses.translation: And at the sky, how it is raised aloft?

verses.content: وَإِلَى الْجِبَالِ كَيْفَ نُصِبَتْ
verses.translation: And at the mountains, how firmly they are reared?

verses.content: وَإِلَى الْأَرْضِ كَيْفَ سُطِحَتْ
verses.translation: And at the earth, how it is spread out?

verses.content: فَذَكِّرْ إِنَّمَا أَنتَ مُذَكِّرٌ
verses.translation: And so, [O Prophet,] exhort them; thy task is only to exhort:

verses.content: لَّسْتَ عَلَيْهِم بِمُصَيْطِرٍ
verses.translation: thou canst not compel them [to believe].

verses.content: إِلَّا مَن تَوَلَّىٰ وَكَفَرَ
verses.translation: However, as for him who turns away, being bent on denying the truth,

verses.content: فَيُعَذِّبُهُ اللَّهُ الْعَذَابَ الْأَكْبَرَ
verses.translation: him will God cause to suffer the greatest suffering [in the life to come]:

verses.content: إِنَّ إِلَيْنَا إِيَابَهُمْ
verses.translation: for behold, unto Us will be their return,

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا حِسَابَهُم
verses.translation: and verily, It is for Us to call them to account.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالْفَجْرِ
verses.translation: CONSIDER the daybreak

verses.content: وَلَيَالٍ عَشْرٍ
verses.translation: and the ten nights!

verses.content: وَالشَّفْعِ وَالْوَتْرِ
verses.translation: Consider the multiple and the One!

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا يَسْرِ
verses.translation: Consider the night as it runs its course!

verses.content: هَلْ فِي ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٌ لِّذِي حِجْرٍ
verses.translation: Considering all this - could there be, to anyone endowed with reason, a [more] solemn evidence of the truth?

verses.content: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ
verses.translation: ART THOU NOT aware of how thy Sustainer has dealt with [the tribe of] ‘Ad,

verses.content: إِرَمَ ذَاتِ الْعِمَادِ
verses.translation: [the people of] Iram the many-pillared,

verses.content: الَّتِي لَمْ يُخْلَقْ مِثْلُهَا فِي الْبِلَادِ
verses.translation: the like of whom has never been reared in all the land? –

verses.content: وَثَمُودَ الَّذِينَ جَابُوا الصَّخْرَ بِالْوَادِ
verses.translation: and with [the tribe of] Thamud, who hollowed out rocks in the valley? –

verses.content: وَفِرْعَوْنَ ذِي الْأَوْتَادِ
verses.translation: and with Pharaoh of the [many] tent-poles?

verses.content: الَّذِينَ طَغَوْا فِي الْبِلَادِ
verses.translation: [It was they] who transgressed all bounds of equity all over their lands,

verses.content: فَأَكْثَرُوا فِيهَا الْفَسَادَ
verses.translation: and brought about great corruption therein:

verses.content: فَصَبَّ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّكَ سَوْطَ عَذَابٍ
verses.translation: and therefore thy Sustainer let loose upon them a scourge of suffering:

verses.content: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَبِالْمِرْصَادِ
verses.translation: for, verily, thy Sustainer is ever on the watch!

verses.content: فَأَمَّا الْإِنسَانُ إِذَا مَا ابْتَلَاهُ رَبُّهُ فَأَكْرَمَهُ وَنَعَّمَهُ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّي أَكْرَمَنِ
verses.translation: BUT AS FOR man, whenever his Sustainer tries him by His generosity and by letting him enjoy a life of ease, he says, "My Sustainer has been [justly] generous towards me";

verses.content: وَأَمَّا إِذَا مَا ابْتَلَاهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيْهِ رِزْقَهُ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّي أَهَانَنِ
verses.translation: whereas, whenever He tries him by straitening his means of livelihood, he says, "My Sustainer has disgraced me!"

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ بَل لَّا تُكْرِمُونَ الْيَتِيمَ
verses.translation: But nay, nay, [O men, consider all that you do and fail to do:] you are not generous towards the orphan,

verses.content: وَلَا تَحَاضُّونَ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ الْمِسْكِينِ
verses.translation: and you do not urge one another to feed the needy,

verses.content: وَتَأْكُلُونَ التُّرَاثَ أَكْلًا لَّمًّا
verses.translation: and you devour the inheritance [of others] with devouring greed,

verses.content: وَتُحِبُّونَ الْمَالَ حُبًّا جَمًّا
verses.translation: and you love wealth with boundless love!

verses.content: كَلَّا إِذَا دُكَّتِ الْأَرْضُ دَكًّا دَكًّا
verses.translation: Nay, but [how will you fare on Judgment Day,] when the earth is crushed with crushing upon crushing,

verses.content: وَجَاءَ رَبُّكَ وَالْمَلَكُ صَفًّا صَفًّا
verses.translation: and [the majesty of] thy Sustainer stands revealed, as well as [the true nature of] the angels; rank upon rank?

verses.content: وَجِيءَ يَوْمَئِذٍ بِجَهَنَّمَ ۚ يَوْمَئِذٍ يَتَذَكَّرُ الْإِنسَانُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ الذِّكْرَىٰ
