verses.translation: And on that Day hell will be brought [within sight]; on that Day man will remember [all that he did and failed to do]: but what will that remembrance avail him?

verses.content: يَقُولُ يَا لَيْتَنِي قَدَّمْتُ لِحَيَاتِي
verses.translation: He will say, "Oh, would that I had. provided beforehand for my life [to come]!"

verses.content: فَيَوْمَئِذٍ لَّا يُعَذِّبُ عَذَابَهُ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: For, none can make suffer as He will make suffer [the sinners] on that Day,

verses.content: وَلَا يُوثِقُ وَثَاقَهُ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: and none can bind with bonds like His.

verses.content: يَا أَيَّتُهَا النَّفْسُ الْمُطْمَئِنَّةُ
verses.translation: [But unto the righteous God will say,] "O thou human being that hast attained to inner peace!

verses.content: ارْجِعِي إِلَىٰ رَبِّكِ رَاضِيَةً مَّرْضِيَّةً
verses.translation: Return thou unto thy Sustainer, well-pleased [and] pleasing [Him]:

verses.content: فَادْخُلِي فِي عِبَادِي
verses.translation: enter, then, together with My [other true] servants –

verses.content: وَادْخُلِي جَنَّتِي
verses.translation: yea, enter thou My paradise!"

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ لَا أُقْسِمُ بِهَـٰذَا الْبَلَدِ
verses.translation: NAY! I call to witness this land –

verses.content: وَأَنتَ حِلٌّ بِهَـٰذَا الْبَلَدِ
verses.translation: this land in which thou art free to dwell -

verses.content: وَوَالِدٍ وَمَا وَلَدَ
verses.translation: and [I call to witness] parent and offspring:

verses.content: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ فِي كَبَدٍ
verses.translation: Verily, We have created man into [a life of] pain, toil and trial.

verses.content: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقْدِرَ عَلَيْهِ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: Does he, then, think that no one has power over him?

verses.content: يَقُولُ أَهْلَكْتُ مَالًا لُّبَدًا
verses.translation: He boasts, "I have spent wealth abundant!"

verses.content: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّمْ يَرَهُ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: Does he, then, think that no one sees him?

verses.content: أَلَمْ نَجْعَل لَّهُ عَيْنَيْنِ
verses.translation: Have We not given him two eyes,

verses.content: وَلِسَانًا وَشَفَتَيْنِ
verses.translation: and a tongue, and a pair of lips,

verses.content: وَهَدَيْنَاهُ النَّجْدَيْنِ
verses.translation: and shown him the two highways [of good and evil]?

verses.content: فَلَا اقْتَحَمَ الْعَقَبَةَ
verses.translation: But he would not try to ascend the steep uphill road...

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الْعَقَبَةُ
verses.translation: And what could make thee conceive what it is, that steep uphill road?

verses.content: فَكُّ رَقَبَةٍ
verses.translation: [It is] the freeing of one's neck [from the burden of sin],

verses.content: أَوْ إِطْعَامٌ فِي يَوْمٍ ذِي مَسْغَبَةٍ
verses.translation: or the feeding, upon a day of [one's own] hunger,

verses.content: يَتِيمًا ذَا مَقْرَبَةٍ
verses.translation: of an orphan near of kin,

verses.content: أَوْ مِسْكِينًا ذَا مَتْرَبَةٍ
verses.translation: or of a needy [stranger] lying in the dust –

verses.content: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالصَّبْرِ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالْمَرْحَمَةِ
verses.translation: and being, withal, of those who have attained to faith, and who enjoin upon one another patience in adversity, and enjoin upon one another compassion.

verses.content: أُولَـٰئِكَ أَصْحَابُ الْمَيْمَنَةِ
verses.translation: Such are they that have attained to righteousness;

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا بِآيَاتِنَا هُمْ أَصْحَابُ الْمَشْأَمَةِ
verses.translation: whereas those who are bent on denying the truth of Our messages – they are such as have lost themselves in evil,

verses.content: عَلَيْهِمْ نَارٌ مُّؤْصَدَةٌ
verses.translation: [with] fire closing in upon them.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالشَّمْسِ وَضُحَاهَا
verses.translation: CONSIDER the sun and its radiant brightness,

verses.content: وَالْقَمَرِ إِذَا تَلَاهَا
verses.translation: and the moon as it reflects the sun!

verses.content: وَالنَّهَارِ إِذَا جَلَّاهَا
verses.translation: Consider the day as it reveals the world,

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَاهَا
verses.translation: and the night as it veils it darkly!

verses.content: وَالسَّمَاءِ وَمَا بَنَاهَا
verses.translation: Consider the sky and its wondrous make,

verses.content: وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا طَحَاهَا
verses.translation: and the earth and all its expanse!

verses.content: وَنَفْسٍ وَمَا سَوَّاهَا
verses.translation: Consider the human self, and how it is formed in accordance with what it is meant to be,

verses.content: فَأَلْهَمَهَا فُجُورَهَا وَتَقْوَاهَا
verses.translation: and how it is imbued with moral failings as well as with consciousness of God!

verses.content: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن زَكَّاهَا
verses.translation: To a happy state shall indeed attain he who causes this [self] to grow in purity,

verses.content: وَقَدْ خَابَ مَن دَسَّاهَا
verses.translation: and truly lost is he who buries it [in darkness].

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِطَغْوَاهَا
verses.translation: TO [THIS] TRUTH gave the lie, in their overweening arrogance, [the tribe of] Thamud,

verses.content: إِذِ انبَعَثَ أَشْقَاهَا
verses.translation: when that most hapless wretch from among them rushed forward [to commit his evil deed],

verses.content: فَقَالَ لَهُمْ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ نَاقَةَ اللَّهِ وَسُقْيَاهَا
verses.translation: although God's apostle had told them, "It is a she-camel belonging to God, so let her drink [and do her no harm]!"

verses.content: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمْدَمَ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّهُم بِذَنبِهِمْ فَسَوَّاهَا
verses.translation: But they gave him the lie, and cruelly slaughtered her - whereupon their Sustainer visited them with utter destruction for this their sin, destroying them all alike:

verses.content: وَلَا يَخَافُ عُقْبَاهَا
verses.translation: for none [of them] had any fear of what might befall them.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَىٰ
verses.translation: CONSIDER the night as it veils [the earth] in darkness,

verses.content: وَالنَّهَارِ إِذَا تَجَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: and the day as it rises bright!

verses.content: وَمَا خَلَقَ الذَّكَرَ وَالْأُنثَىٰ
verses.translation: Consider the creation of the male and the female!

verses.content: إِنَّ سَعْيَكُمْ لَشَتَّىٰ
verses.translation: Verily, [O men,] you aim at most divergent ends!

verses.content: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أَعْطَىٰ وَاتَّقَىٰ
verses.translation: Thus, as for him who gives [to others] and is conscious of God,

verses.content: وَصَدَّقَ بِالْحُسْنَىٰ
verses.translation: and believes in the truth of the ultimate good

verses.content: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ
verses.translation: for him shall We make easy the path towards [ultimate] ease.

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَن بَخِلَ وَاسْتَغْنَىٰ
verses.translation: But as for him who is niggardly, and thinks that he is self-sufficient,

verses.content: وَكَذَّبَ بِالْحُسْنَىٰ
verses.translation: and calls the ultimate good a lie –

verses.content: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُ لِلْعُسْرَىٰ
verses.translation: for him shall We make easy the path towards hardship:

verses.content: وَمَا يُغْنِي عَنْهُ مَالُهُ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰ
verses.translation: and what will his wealth avail him when he goes down [to his grave]?

verses.content: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا لَلْهُدَىٰ
verses.translation: BEHOLD, it is indeed for Us to grace [you] with guidance;

verses.content: وَإِنَّ لَنَا لَلْآخِرَةَ وَالْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: and, behold, Ours is [the dominion over] the life to come as well as [over] this earlier part [of your life]:

verses.content: فَأَنذَرْتُكُمْ نَارًا تَلَظَّىٰ
verses.translation: and so I warn you of the raging fire -

verses.content: لَا يَصْلَاهَا إِلَّا الْأَشْقَى
verses.translation: [the fire] which none shall have to endure but that most hapless wretch

verses.content: الَّذِي كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: who gives the lie to the truth and turns away [from it].

verses.content: وَسَيُجَنَّبُهَا الْأَتْقَى
verses.translation: For, distant from it shall remain he who is truly conscious of God:

verses.content: الَّذِي يُؤْتِي مَالَهُ يَتَزَكَّىٰ
verses.translation: he that spends his possessions [on others] so that he might grow in purity –

verses.content: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُ مِن نِّعْمَةٍ تُجْزَىٰ
verses.translation: not as payment for favours received,

verses.content: إِلَّا ابْتِغَاءَ وَجْهِ رَبِّهِ الْأَعْلَىٰ
verses.translation: but only out of a longing for the countenance of his Sustainer, the All-Highest:

verses.content: وَلَسَوْفَ يَرْضَىٰ
verses.translation: and such, indeed, shall in time be well-pleased.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالضُّحَىٰ
verses.translation: CONSIDER the bright morning hours,

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا سَجَىٰ
verses.translation: and the night when it grows still and dark.

verses.content: مَا وَدَّعَكَ رَبُّكَ وَمَا قَلَىٰ
verses.translation: Thy Sustainer has not forsaken thee, nor does He scorn thee:

verses.content: وَلَلْآخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ لَّكَ مِنَ الْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: for, indeed, the life to come will be better for thee than this earlier part [of thy life]!

verses.content: وَلَسَوْفَ يُعْطِيكَ رَبُّكَ فَتَرْضَىٰ
verses.translation: And, indeed, in time will thy Sustainer grant thee [what thy heart desires], and thou shalt be well-pleased.

verses.content: أَلَمْ يَجِدْكَ يَتِيمًا فَآوَىٰ
verses.translation: Has He not found thee an orphan, and given thee shelter?

verses.content: وَوَجَدَكَ ضَالًّا فَهَدَىٰ
verses.translation: And found thee lost on thy way, and guided thee?

verses.content: وَوَجَدَكَ عَائِلًا فَأَغْنَىٰ
verses.translation: And found thee in want, and given thee sufficiency?

verses.content: فَأَمَّا الْيَتِيمَ فَلَا تَقْهَرْ
verses.translation: Therefore, the orphan shalt thou never wrong,

verses.content: وَأَمَّا السَّائِلَ فَلَا تَنْهَرْ
verses.translation: and him that seeks [thy] help shalt thou never chide,

verses.content: وَأَمَّا بِنِعْمَةِ رَبِّكَ فَحَدِّثْ
verses.translation: and of thy Sustainer's blessings shalt thou [ever] speak.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ أَلَمْ نَشْرَحْ لَكَ صَدْرَكَ
verses.translation: HAVE WE NOT opened up thy heart,

verses.content: وَوَضَعْنَا عَنكَ وِزْرَكَ
verses.translation: and lifted from thee the burden

verses.content: الَّذِي أَنقَضَ ظَهْرَكَ
verses.translation: that had weighed so heavily on thy back?

verses.content: وَرَفَعْنَا لَكَ ذِكْرَكَ
verses.translation: And [have We not] raised thee high in dignity?

verses.content: فَإِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
verses.translation: And, behold, with every hardship comes ease:

verses.content: إِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
verses.translation: verily, with every hardship comes ease!

verses.content: فَإِذَا فَرَغْتَ فَانصَبْ
verses.translation: Hence, when thou art freed [from distress], remain steadfast,

verses.content: وَإِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَارْغَب
verses.translation: and unto thy Sustainer turn with love.

verses.content: بِّسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالتِّينِ وَالزَّيْتُونِ
verses.translation: CONSIDER the fig and the olive,

verses.content: وَطُورِ سِينِينَ
verses.translation: and Mount Sinai,

verses.content: وَهَـٰذَا الْبَلَدِ الْأَمِينِ
verses.translation: and this land secure!

verses.content: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ فِي أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيمٍ
verses.translation: Verily, We create man in the best conformation;

verses.content: ثُمَّ رَدَدْنَاهُ أَسْفَلَ سَافِلِينَ
verses.translation: and thereafter We reduce him to the lowest of low

verses.content: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ فَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ
verses.translation: excepting only such as attain to faith and do good works: and theirs shall be a reward unending!

verses.content: فَمَا يُكَذِّبُكَ بَعْدُ بِالدِّينِ
verses.translation: What, then, [O man,] could henceforth cause thee to give the lie to this moral law?

verses.content: أَلَيْسَ اللَّهُ بِأَحْكَمِ الْحَاكِمِينَ
verses.translation: Is not God the most just of judges?

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ اقْرَأْ بِاسْمِ رَبِّكَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ
verses.translation: READ in the name of thy Sustainer, who has-

verses.content: خَلَقَ الْإِنسَانَ مِنْ عَلَقٍ
verses.translation: created man out of a germ-cell

verses.content: اقْرَأْ وَرَبُّكَ الْأَكْرَمُ
verses.translation: Read - for thy Sustainer is the Most Bountiful One

verses.content: الَّذِي عَلَّمَ بِالْقَلَمِ
verses.translation: who has taught [man] the use of the pen –

verses.content: عَلَّمَ الْإِنسَانَ مَا لَمْ يَعْلَمْ
verses.translation: taught man what he did not know!

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّ الْإِنسَانَ لَيَطْغَىٰ
verses.translation: Nay, verily, man becomes grossly overweening

verses.content: أَن رَّآهُ اسْتَغْنَىٰ
verses.translation: whenever he believes himself to be self-sufficient:

verses.content: إِنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ الرُّجْعَىٰ
verses.translation: for, behold, unto thy Sustainer all must return.

verses.content: أَرَأَيْتَ الَّذِي يَنْهَىٰ
verses.translation: HAST THOU ever considered him who tries to prevent

verses.content: عَبْدًا إِذَا صَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: a servant [of God] from praying?

verses.content: أَرَأَيْتَ إِن كَانَ عَلَى الْهُدَىٰ
verses.translation: Hast thou considered whether he is on the right way,

verses.content: أَوْ أَمَرَ بِالتَّقْوَىٰ
verses.translation: or is concerned with God-consciousness?

verses.content: أَرَأَيْتَ إِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: Hast thou considered whether he may [not] be giving the lie to the truth and turning his back [upon it]?

verses.content: أَلَمْ يَعْلَم بِأَنَّ اللَّهَ يَرَىٰ
verses.translation: Does he, then, not know that God sees [all]?

verses.content: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمْ يَنتَهِ لَنَسْفَعًا بِالنَّاصِيَةِ
verses.translation: Nay, if he desist not, We shall most surely drag him down upon his forehead

verses.content: نَاصِيَةٍ كَاذِبَةٍ خَاطِئَةٍ
verses.translation: the lying, rebellious forehead! –

verses.content: فَلْيَدْعُ نَادِيَهُ
verses.translation: and then let him summon [to his aid] the counsels of his own [spurious] wisdom,

verses.content: سَنَدْعُ الزَّبَانِيَةَ
verses.translation: [the while] We shall summon the forces of heavenly chastisement!

verses.content: كَلَّا لَا تُطِعْهُ وَاسْجُدْ وَاقْتَرِب ۩
verses.translation: Nay, pay thou no heed to him, but prostrate thyself [before God] and draw close [unto Him]!

verses.content: بِّسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِنَّا أَنزَلْنَاهُ فِي لَيْلَةِ الْقَدْرِ
verses.translation: BEHOLD, from on high have We bestowed this [divine writ] on Night of Destiny.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِ
verses.translation: And what could make thee conceive what it is, that Night of Destiny?

verses.content: لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ
verses.translation: The Night of Destiny is better than a thousand months:

verses.content: تَنَزَّلُ الْمَلَائِكَةُ وَالرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمْرٍ
verses.translation: in hosts descend in it the angels, bearing divine inspiration by their Sustainer's leave; from all [evil] that may happen

verses.content: سَلَامٌ هِيَ حَتَّىٰ مَطْلَعِ الْفَجْرِ
verses.translation: does it make secure, until the rise of dawn.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ لَمْ يَكُنِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْ أَهْلِ الْكِتَابِ وَالْمُشْرِكِينَ مُنفَكِّينَ حَتَّىٰ تَأْتِيَهُمُ الْبَيِّنَةُ
verses.translation: IT IS NOT [conceivable] that such as are bent on denying the truth - [be they] from among the followers of earlier revelation or from among those who ascribe divinity to aught beside God should ever be abandoned [by Him] ere there comes unto them the [full] evidence of the truth:

verses.content: رَسُولٌ مِّنَ اللَّهِ يَتْلُو صُحُفًا مُّطَهَّرَةً
verses.translation: an apostle from God, conveying [unto them] revelations blest with purity,

verses.content: فِيهَا كُتُبٌ قَيِّمَةٌ
verses.translation: wherein there are ordinances of ever-true soundness and clarity.

verses.content: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ إِلَّا مِن بَعْدِ مَا جَاءَتْهُمُ الْبَيِّنَةُ
verses.translation: Now those who have been vouchsafed revelation aforetime did break up their unity [of faith] after such an evidence of the truth had come to them.

verses.content: وَمَا أُمِرُوا إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُوا اللَّهَ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ الدِّينَ حُنَفَاءَ وَيُقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَيُؤْتُوا الزَّكَاةَ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ دِينُ الْقَيِّمَةِ
verses.translation: And withal, they were not enjoined aught but that they should worship God, sincere in their faith in Him alone, turning away from all that is false; and that they should be constant in prayer; and that they should spend in charity: for this is a moral law endowed with ever-true soundness and clarity.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْ أَهْلِ الْكِتَابِ وَالْمُشْرِكِينَ فِي نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ أُولَـٰئِكَ هُمْ شَرُّ الْبَرِيَّةِ
verses.translation: Verily, those who [despite all evidence] are bent on denying the truth - [be they] from among the followers of earlier revelation or from among those who ascribe divinity to aught beside God - will find themselves in the fire of hell, therein to abide: they are the worst of all creatures.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ أُولَـٰئِكَ هُمْ خَيْرُ الْبَرِيَّةِ
verses.translation: [And,] verily, those who have attained to faith, and do righteous deeds - it is they, they who are the best of all creatures.

verses.content: جَزَاؤُهُمْ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ جَنَّاتُ عَدْنٍ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا أَبَدًا ۖ رَّضِيَ اللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ وَرَضُوا عَنْهُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنْ خَشِيَ رَبَّهُ
verses.translation: Their reward [awaits them] with God: gardens of perpetual bliss, through which running waters flow, therein to abide beyond the count of time; well-pleased is God with them, and well-pleased are they with Him: all this awaits him who of his Sustainer stands in awe!.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا زُلْزِلَتِ الْأَرْضُ زِلْزَالَهَا
verses.translation: WHEN THE EARTH quakes with her [last] mighty quaking,

verses.content: وَأَخْرَجَتِ الْأَرْضُ أَثْقَالَهَا
verses.translation: and [when] the earth yields up her burdens,

verses.content: وَقَالَ الْإِنسَانُ مَا لَهَا
verses.translation: and man cries out, "What has happened to her?" -

verses.content: يَوْمَئِذٍ تُحَدِّثُ أَخْبَارَهَا
verses.translation: on that Day will she recount all her tidings,

verses.content: بِأَنَّ رَبَّكَ أَوْحَىٰ لَهَا
verses.translation: as thy Sustainer will have inspired her to do!

verses.content: يَوْمَئِذٍ يَصْدُرُ النَّاسُ أَشْتَاتًا لِّيُرَوْا أَعْمَالَهُمْ
verses.translation: On that Day will all men come forward, cut off from one another, to be shown their [past] deeds.

verses.content: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًا يَرَهُ
verses.translation: And so, he who shall have done an atom's weight of good, shall behold it;

verses.content: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ شَرًّا يَرَهُ
verses.translation: and he who shall have done an atom's weight of evil, shall behold it.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالْعَادِيَاتِ ضَبْحًا
verses.translation: Oh, the chargers that run panting,

verses.content: فَالْمُورِيَاتِ قَدْحًا
verses.translation: sparks of fire striking,

verses.content: فَالْمُغِيرَاتِ صُبْحًا
verses.translation: rushing to assault at morn,

verses.content: فَأَثَرْنَ بِهِ نَقْعًا
verses.translation: thereby raising clouds of dust,

verses.content: فَوَسَطْنَ بِهِ جَمْعًا
verses.translation: thereby storming [blindly] into any host!

verses.content: إِنَّ الْإِنسَانَ لِرَبِّهِ لَكَنُودٌ
verses.translation: VERILY, towards his Sustainer man is most ungrateful

verses.content: وَإِنَّهُ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ لَشَهِيدٌ
verses.translation: and to this, behold, he [himself] bears witness indeed:

verses.content: وَإِنَّهُ لِحُبِّ الْخَيْرِ لَشَدِيدٌ
verses.translation: for, verily, to the love of wealth is he most ardently devoted.

verses.content: أَفَلَا يَعْلَمُ إِذَا بُعْثِرَ مَا فِي الْقُبُورِ
verses.translation: But does he not know that [on the Last Day,] when all that is in the graves is raised and brought out,

verses.content: وَحُصِّلَ مَا فِي الصُّدُورِ
verses.translation: and all that is [hidden] in men's hearts is bared

verses.content: إِنَّ رَبَّهُم بِهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَّخَبِيرٌ
verses.translation: that on that Day their Sustainer [will show that He] has always been fully aware of them?

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ الْقَارِعَةُ
verses.translation: OH, the sudden calamity!

verses.content: مَا الْقَارِعَةُ
verses.translation: How awesome the sudden calamity!

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الْقَارِعَةُ
verses.translation: And what could make thee conceive what that sudden calamity will be?

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَكُونُ النَّاسُ كَالْفَرَاشِ الْمَبْثُوثِ
verses.translation: [It will occur] on the Day when men will be like moths swarming in confusion,

verses.content: وَتَكُونُ الْجِبَالُ كَالْعِهْنِ الْمَنفُوشِ
verses.translation: and the mountains will be like fluffy tufts of wool....

verses.content: فَأَمَّا مَن ثَقُلَتْ مَوَازِينُهُ
verses.translation: And then, he whose weight [of good deeds] is heavy in the balance

verses.content: فَهُوَ فِي عِيشَةٍ رَّاضِيَةٍ
verses.translation: shall find himself in a happy' state of life;

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَفَّتْ مَوَازِينُهُ
verses.translation: whereas he whose weight is light in the balance

verses.content: فَأُمُّهُ هَاوِيَةٌ
verses.translation: shall be engulfed by an abyss.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا هِيَهْ
verses.translation: And what could make thee conceive what that [abyss] will be?

verses.content: نَارٌ حَامِيَةٌ
verses.translation: A fire hotly burning!

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ أَلْهَاكُمُ التَّكَاثُرُ
verses.translation: YOU ARE OBSESSED by greed for more and more

verses.content: حَتَّىٰ زُرْتُمُ الْمَقَابِرَ
verses.translation: until you go down to your graves.

verses.content: كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Nay, in time you will come to understand!

verses.content: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: And once again: Nay, in time you will come to understand!

verses.content: كَلَّا لَوْ تَعْلَمُونَ عِلْمَ الْيَقِينِ
verses.translation: Nay, if you could but understand [it] with an understanding [born] of certainty,

verses.content: لَتَرَوُنَّ الْجَحِيمَ
verses.translation: you would indeed, most surely, behold the blazing fire [of hell]!

verses.content: ثُمَّ لَتَرَوُنَّهَا عَيْنَ الْيَقِينِ
verses.translation: In the end you will indeed, most surely, behold it with the eye of certainty:

verses.content: ثُمَّ لَتُسْأَلُنَّ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَنِ النَّعِيمِ
verses.translation: and on that Day you will most surely be called to account for [what you did with] the boon of life!

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالْعَصْرِ
verses.translation: CONSIDER the flight of time!

verses.content: إِنَّ الْإِنسَانَ لَفِي خُسْرٍ
verses.translation: Verily, man is bound to lose himself

verses.content: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالْحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالصَّبْرِ
verses.translation: unless he be of those who attain to faith, and do good works, and enjoin upon one another the keeping to truth, and enjoin upon one another patience in adversity.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَيْلٌ لِّكُلِّ هُمَزَةٍ لُّمَزَةٍ
verses.translation: WOE unto every slanderer, fault-finder!

verses.content: الَّذِي جَمَعَ مَالًا وَعَدَّدَهُ
verses.translation: [Woe unto him who amasses wealth and counts it a safeguard,

verses.content: يَحْسَبُ أَنَّ مَالَهُ أَخْلَدَهُ
verses.translation: thinking that his wealth will make him live forever!

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ لَيُنبَذَنَّ فِي الْحُطَمَةِ
verses.translation: Nay, but [in the life to come such as] he shall indeed be abandoned to crushing torment!

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الْحُطَمَةُ
verses.translation: And what could make thee conceive what that crushing torment will be?

verses.content: نَارُ اللَّهِ الْمُوقَدَةُ
verses.translation: A fire kindled by God,

verses.content: الَّتِي تَطَّلِعُ عَلَى الْأَفْئِدَةِ
verses.translation: which will rise over the [guilty] hearts:

verses.content: إِنَّهَا عَلَيْهِم مُّؤْصَدَةٌ
verses.translation: verily, it will close in upon them

verses.content: فِي عَمَدٍ مُّمَدَّدَةٍ
verses.translation: in endless columns!

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصْحَابِ الْفِيلِ
verses.translation: ART THOU NOT aware of how thy Sustainer dealt with the Army of the Elephant?

verses.content: أَلَمْ يَجْعَلْ كَيْدَهُمْ فِي تَضْلِيلٍ
verses.translation: Did He not utterly confound their artful planning?

verses.content: وَأَرْسَلَ عَلَيْهِمْ طَيْرًا أَبَابِيلَ
verses.translation: Thus, He let loose upon them great swarms of flying creatures

verses.content: تَرْمِيهِم بِحِجَارَةٍ مِّن سِجِّيلٍ
verses.translation: which smote them with stone-hard blows of chastisement pre-ordained,

verses.content: فَجَعَلَهُمْ كَعَصْفٍ مَّأْكُولٍ
verses.translation: and caused them to become like a field of grain that has been eaten down to stubble

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ لِإِيلَافِ قُرَيْشٍ
verses.translation: SO THAT the Quraysh might remain secure,

verses.content: إِيلَافِهِمْ رِحْلَةَ الشِّتَاءِ وَالصَّيْفِ
verses.translation: secure in their winter and summer journeys,

verses.content: فَلْيَعْبُدُوا رَبَّ هَـٰذَا الْبَيْتِ
verses.translation: Let them, therefore, worship the Sustainer of this Temple;

verses.content: الَّذِي أَطْعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٍ وَآمَنَهُم مِّنْ خَوْفٍ
verses.translation: who has given them food against hunger, and made them safe from danger.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ أَرَأَيْتَ الَّذِي يُكَذِّبُ بِالدِّينِ
verses.translation: HAST THOU ever considered [the kind of man] who gives the lie to all moral law?

verses.content: فَذَٰلِكَ الَّذِي يَدُعُّ الْيَتِيمَ
verses.translation: Behold, it is this [kind of man] that thrusts the orphan away,

verses.content: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ الْمِسْكِينِ
verses.translation: and feels no urge to feed the needy.

verses.content: فَوَيْلٌ لِّلْمُصَلِّينَ
verses.translation: Woe, then, unto those praying ones

verses.content: الَّذِينَ هُمْ عَن صَلَاتِهِمْ سَاهُونَ
verses.translation: whose hearts from their prayer are remote

verses.content: الَّذِينَ هُمْ يُرَاءُونَ
verses.translation: those who want only to be seen and praised,

verses.content: وَيَمْنَعُونَ الْمَاعُونَ
verses.translation: and, withal, deny all assistance [to their fellow-men]!

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِنَّا أَعْطَيْنَاكَ الْكَوْثَرَ
verses.translation: BEHOLD, We have bestowed upon thee good in abundance:

verses.content: فَصَلِّ لِرَبِّكَ وَانْحَرْ
verses.translation: hence, pray unto thy Sustainer [alone], and sacrifice [unto Him alone].

verses.content: إِنَّ شَانِئَكَ هُوَ الْأَبْتَرُ
verses.translation: Verily, he that hates thee has indeed been cut off [from all that is good]!

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قُلْ يَا أَيُّهَا الْكَافِرُونَ
verses.translation: SAY: "O you who deny the truth!

verses.content: لَا أَعْبُدُ مَا تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.translation: "I do not worship that which you worship,

verses.content: وَلَا أَنتُمْ عَابِدُونَ مَا أَعْبُدُ
verses.translation: and neither do you worship that which I worship!

verses.content: وَلَا أَنَا عَابِدٌ مَّا عَبَدتُّمْ
verses.translation: "And I will not worship ~hat which you have [ever] worshipped,

verses.content: وَلَا أَنتُمْ عَابِدُونَ مَا أَعْبُدُ
verses.translation: and neither will you [ever] worship that which I worship.

verses.content: لَكُمْ دِينُكُمْ وَلِيَ دِينِ
verses.translation: Unto you, your moral law, and unto me, mine!"

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا جَاءَ نَصْرُ اللَّهِ وَالْفَتْحُ
verses.translation: WHEN GOD'S SUCCOUR comes, and victory,

verses.content: وَرَأَيْتَ النَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ اللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًا
verses.translation: and thou seest people enter God's religion in hosts,

verses.content: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَاسْتَغْفِرْهُ ۚ إِنَّهُ كَانَ تَوَّابًا
verses.translation: extol thy Sustainer's limitless glory, and praise Him, and seek His forgiveness: for, behold, He is ever an acceptor of repentance.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ تَبَّتْ يَدَا أَبِي لَهَبٍ وَتَبَّ
verses.translation: DOOMED are the hands of him of the glowing countence: and doomed is he!

verses.content: مَا أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُ مَالُهُ وَمَا كَسَبَ
verses.translation: What will his wealth avail him, and all that he has gained?

verses.content: سَيَصْلَىٰ نَارًا ذَاتَ لَهَبٍ
verses.translation: [In the life to come] he shall have to endure a fire fiercely glowing;

verses.content: وَامْرَأَتُهُ حَمَّالَةَ الْحَطَبِ
verses.translation: together with his wife, that carrier of evil tales,

verses.content: فِي جِيدِهَا حَبْلٌ مِّن مَّسَدٍ
verses.translation: [who bears] around her neck a rope of twisted strands!

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قُلْ هُوَ اللَّهُ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: SAY: "He is the One God:

verses.content: اللَّهُ الصَّمَدُ
verses.translation: "God the Eternal, the Uncaused Cause of All Being.

verses.content: لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ
verses.translation: "He begets not, and neither is He begotten;

verses.content: وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: "and there is nothing that could be compared with Him.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ الْفَلَقِ
verses.translation: SAY: "I seek refuge with the Sustainer of the rising dawn,

verses.content: مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
verses.translation: "from the evil of aught that He has created,

verses.content: وَمِن شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ
verses.translation: "and from the evil of the black darkness whenever it descends,

verses.content: وَمِن شَرِّ النَّفَّاثَاتِ فِي الْعُقَدِ
verses.translation: "and from the evil of all human beings bent on occult endeavours,

verses.content: وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ
verses.translation: "and from the evil of the envious when he envies."

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ النَّاسِ
verses.translation: SAY: "I seek refuge with the Sustainer of men,

verses.content: مَلِكِ النَّاسِ
verses.translation: "the Sovereign of men,

verses.content: إِلَـٰهِ النَّاسِ
verses.translation: "the God of men,

verses.content: مِن شَرِّ الْوَسْوَاسِ الْخَنَّاسِ
verses.translation: "from the evil of the whispering, elusive tempter

verses.content: الَّذِي يُوَسْوِسُ فِي صُدُورِ النَّاسِ
verses.translation: "who whispers in the hearts of men

verses.content: مِنَ الْجِنَّةِ وَالنَّاسِ
verses.translation: "from all [temptation to evil by] invisible forces as well as men,"
